28 岁大厨在旧金山购物中心发现尸体

28-Year-Old Chef Found Death at San Francisco Mall

28-Year-Old Chef Found Found at San Francisco Mall
28年大厨被发现于旧金山商场
A 28-year-old chef who had recently moved to San Francisco was found dead in the stairwell of a local mall this week.
一位28岁的厨师最近搬到了旧金山,这星期被发现死在一家当地商场的楼梯井里。

The body found at the Westfield Mall Wednesday morning was identified as 28-year-old San Francisco resident Frank Galicia, the San Francisco Medical Examiner's Office said.
旧金山医学检查师办公室说,星期三上午在威斯特菲尔德购物中心发现的尸体被确认为旧金山28岁的居民Frank Galicia。

of body found at the Westfield Mall Wednesday morning was identified as 28-year-old San Francisco resident Frank Galicia, the San Francisco Medical Examiner's Office said.
旧金山医学检查师办公室说,星期三上午在威斯特菲尔德购物中心发现的遗体被确认为旧金山28岁的居民Frank Galicia。
The victim's brother, Louis Galicia, told ABC station KGO in San Francisco that Frank, previously a line cook in Boston, had landed his dream job as line chef at San Francisco's Sons & Daughters restaurant six months ago.

少年医生罢工:呼吁采取新的罢工行动
Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise fresh industrial action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们呼吁他们的工会在他们争论新合同时授权新的产业行动。
Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise fresh industrial actions in their dispute about a new contract.

Representatives of junior doctors have called on their union to authorise fresh occupational action in their dispute about a new contract.
初级医生的代表们呼吁他们的工会在他们关于新合同的争议中授权新的职业行动。
The Junior Doctors Committee ( JDC ) of the British Medical Association ( BMA ) is to ask its full council to back more industrial action from early September.

首席执行官说:“现在我们转移到品牌银行的时机已经成熟,因为我们一直在问,在下面,我们如何专注于让这家更好的客户银行呢?”
" This time is right for us to move to the bank of brands, because underneath ( we've been asking ) how do we focus on making this a better bank for customers ? " said the chief executive.
首席执行官说:“这次我们转移到品牌银行是对的,因为我们一直在问,在下面,我们是如何专注于让这家更好的客户银行的呢?”
" It time is right for us to move to the bank of brands, because underneath ( we've been asking ) how do we focus on making this a better bank for customers ? " said the chief executive.

A Banff man has appealed for help in identifying fish that have appeared in his garden in Banff.

一位班夫男子呼吁帮助识别在班夫花园中发现的鱼。
Kevin Bain thinks the 75 fish could be sand eels deposited by a waterspout.
凯文·贝恩认为75条鱼可能是水泉沉积的沙鳗鱼.
Kevin Bain thinks the 75 fish could be sand eels sediment by a waterspout.
凯文·贝恩认为这75只鱼类可能是沙鳗鱼通过喷水池沉淀的.
Kevin Bain thinks the 75 fish could be sand eels sediments by a waterspout.

Kevin Bain thinks the 75 fish could be sand eels deposits by a waterspout.

The 18-year-old American gymnast soared to the all-around title on Thursday, putting the gap between herself and the rest of the world on full display under the Olympic spotlight.

Biles has spent the last three years dominating her sport, winning 15 world championship medals-including 10 gold-with routines so astonishing in their mix of ambition and precision that 1984 Olympic champion Mary Lou Retton called her " the greatest gymnast I've ever seen. "

But the reality is that gymnastics is an expensive sport, and gymnasts primarily train in private gymnastics clubs that are maintained by parents paying the cost of the training, facility, travel, uniforms, competition fees, hotel fees ( for the coaches and their gymnasts and families ) and the list goes on.
但实际情况是体操是一项昂贵的运动,体操主要是私人体操俱乐部的训练,这些操练费用由支付培训、设施、旅行、校服、竞赛费、酒店费用的父母(教练及其体操运动员及其家庭的费用)维持,而且名单还在继续。

At my organizations, we have provided free and low-cost gymnastics, based in Harlem, for over 15, 000 urban youth ( primarily black and Hispanic ) and have trained national and international champions.
在我的组织里,我们为1万5千多名城市青年(主要是黑人和拉丁裔青年)提供了设在哈莱姆的低成本免费体操,并培训了本国和国际的冠军。

Mr Mortimer said : " Industrial action achieves little or nothing, but places pressure on already stretched teams and services and causes worry, distress and disruption for patients, carers and their families. "
摩梯末说:“工业行动几乎无所作为,但却给已经捉襟见肘的团队和服务带来压力,给病人、护理人员及其家人带来担忧、烦恼和干扰。”

摩梯末说:"工业行动不会取得什么成果,也不会取得什么成果,而是给已经捉襟见肘的团队和服务带来压力,给病人、护理人员及其家人带来担忧、烦恼和干扰。
of Mortimer said : " Industrial action achieves little or nothing, but places pressure on already stretched teams and services and causes worry, distress and disruption for patients, carers and their families. "
摩梯末说:"工业行动几乎无所作为,但给已经捉襟见肘的团队和服务带来压力,给病人、照顾者及其家人带来担忧、烦恼和干扰。
in Mortimer said : " Industrial action achieves little or nothing, but places pressure on already stretched teams and services and causes worry, distress and disruption for patients, carers and their families. "
摩梯末说:"工业行动几乎或完全没有结果,但是给已经捉襟见肘的团队和服务带来压力,给病人、护理人员及其家人带来担忧、烦恼和干扰。
Over the last two months we have been talking with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月里,我们一直与初级医生委员会对话,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应他们对监护人角色和惠斯布劳的担忧。

Over and last two months we have been talking with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.

Over Government last two months we have been talking with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月里,我们一直与初级医生委员会对话,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应他们对监护人作用和惠斯布劳的担忧。
Over the past two months we have been talking with the Junior Doctors Committee and have, along with the Department of Health and others, responded positively to their concerns regarding the Guardian Role and Whistleblowing.
在过去两个月里,我们一直与初级医生委员会对话,并与卫生部和其他方面一道,积极回应他们对监护人角色和惠斯布劳的担忧。
Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主希望,在其他重要议题上,如部署、培训的灵活性、对从职业生涯中断返回的人员的额外培训、培训费用、对教学大纲的相互承认、学习假和医学中的性别薪酬差距等,继续积极参与,这标志着雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议。
Employers were optimistic that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主们乐观地认为,在其他重要问题上继续积极地参与,例如部署、灵活的培训、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供更多的培训、培训费用、相互承认教学大纲、学习假以及医药中的男女工资差别,这标志着雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部在遵守11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议方面表现的严肃态度。
Employers were hoped that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
希望雇主继续积极地参与其他重要议题,如部署、培训的灵活性、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供的额外培训、培训费用、相互承认教学大纲、学习假以及医药中的男女工资差距 -- -- 表明雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与管理局达成的协议。
Employers were hope that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主们希望,在其他重要问题上,如部署、培训的灵活性、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供的额外培训、培训费用、相互承认教学大纲、学习假和医学中的男女工资差别等,继续积极地参与,这标志着雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议。
Employers were hopeful that the continued positive engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, mobility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主希望,在其他重要议题上,如部署、培训中的流动性、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供的额外培训、培训费用、对教学大纲的相互承认、学习假和医学中的性别薪酬差距等,能够表明雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与巴林环境部达成的协议。
Employers were hopeful that the continued favourable engagement on other important topics-such as deployment, flexibility in training, additional training for those returning from career breaks, costs of training, mutual recognition of syllabus, study leave and the gender pay gap in medicine-were a sign of how serious employers, Health Education England and the Department of Health were about honouring the agreements reached with the BMA in November, February and May.
雇主希望,在其他重要问题上继续积极参与,如部署、培训的灵活性、为那些从职业生涯中断中返回的人提供的额外培训、培训费用、相互承认教学大纲、学习假以及医药中的男女工资差别 -- -- 表明雇主、英国卫生教育局和卫生部如何认真履行在11月、2月和5月与管理局达成的协议。

The £2-a-day drug that has cut heart attack threat
这种每天2英镑的药物已经减少心脏病发作的威胁
Thousands of heart attack patients are to benefit from a £2-a-day drug, after officials recommended it be given to more people for longer.
数千名心脏病发作的病人将受益于每天2英镑的药物,此前,官员建议将这种药物长期提供给更多人。

Anti-clotting drug ticagrelor slashes the risk of repeat attacks for people with heart disease.
抗淋巴结瘾药物会使心脏病患者再次发作的风险降低。

The drug is already given for 12 months after a heart attack, reducing the risk of a stroke or another attack.
这种药物在心脏病发作12个月后就已经服用,可以降低中风或再次发作的风险。

该药物在心脏病发作12个月后,降低中风或再次发作的风险。
But now NHS watchdog NICE has advised that it should be given to people for four years, to further reduce the risk of cardiovascular problems.

Some 140, 000 people have a heart attack in England every year, and a quarter of these go on to have another attack or a stroke.
在英国,每年大约有14万人心脏病发作,其中四分之一的人会再次发作或中风。

in 140, 000 people have a heart attack in England every year, and a quarter of these go on to have another attack or a stroke.
在英国每年有140,000人心脏病发作,其中四分之一的人会再次发作或中风。
Heart attacks and strokes are caused by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
心脏病发作和中风是由动脉壁脂肪物质积聚而形成斑块引起的。
Heart attacks or strokes are caused by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
心脏病发作或中风是由动脉壁脂肪物质积聚而形成斑块引起的。
of attacks and strokes are caused by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.

the attacks and strokes are caused by the build-up of fatty material in artery walls to form a plaque.
攻击和中风是由动脉壁中脂肪物质聚集形成斑块引起的。
If the plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
如果斑块断裂,可引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。

如果这个斑块断裂,它会导致血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。
If that plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
如果斑块断裂,可引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。
If a plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
如果斑块断裂,可引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。
a the plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
a 斑块断裂,可引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。
and the plaque breaks apart it can cause a blood clot, blocking blood to the heart causing a heart attack.
斑块会断裂,引起血块,阻塞心脏的血液,导致心脏病发作。
And if the clot dislodges it can travel in the blood stream and block blood flow to the brain, causing a stroke.
如果血块脱落,血流会传播到血流中,阻塞脑部的血流,导致中风。
And if this clot dislodges it can travel in the blood stream and block blood flow to the brain, causing a stroke.
如果血块脱落,血流中就会传播,并阻塞脑部的血流,导致中风。

The draft NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
今天公布的《内酯指导文件草案》建议,人们12个月给90毫克血糖,此后三年内每天两次给90毫克血糖加阿司匹林加60毫克。
The Draft NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
今天公布的《内酯指南草案》建议,人们12个月给90毫克血糖,此后三年内每天给人服用60毫克和阿司匹林。
The revised NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
经修订的NICE指南建议人们在12个月的时间里服90毫克铁甲草胺,然后在3年的时间里每天服食60毫克和阿司匹林。
The new NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
今天发表的新NICE指南建议人们在12个月的时间里服90毫克铁甲草胺,然后每天服用60毫克和阿司匹林,再持续3年。
The updated NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
今天公布的经更新的NICE指南建议,人们12个月给90毫克铁甲草胺,此后三年内每天给人服用60毫克和阿司匹林。
The proposed NICE guidance, published today, recommends that people be given 90 mg of ticagrelor for 12 months, followed by 60mg along with aspirin twice a day for another three years.
今天公布的NICE指南建议人们在12个月中服90毫克铁甲草胺,然后在3年中每天服用60毫克和阿司匹林。
Professor Carole Longson, director at the NICE health technology evaluation centre, said : " Despite the availability of effective secondary prevention treatments, as many as a quarter of people who have had a heart attack go on to have another heart attack or stroke-often with devastating consequences. "
NICE健康技术评价中心主任CaroleLongson教授说:“尽管有有效的二级预防治疗,但是多达四分之一的心脏病发作者会再次心脏病发作或中风——经常是破坏性后果。”
Professor Alison Longson, director at the NICE health technology evaluation centre, said : " Despite the availability of effective secondary prevention treatments, as many as a quarter of people who have had a heart attack go on to have another heart attack or stroke-often with devastating consequences. "
NICE健康技术评价中心主任艾莉森·朗森教授说:“尽管有有效的二级预防治疗,但是多达四分之一的心脏病发作者会再次心脏病发作或中风——经常是破坏性后果。”

"

"

Professor Fiona Longson, director at the NICE health technology evaluation centre, said : " Despite the availability of effective secondary prevention treatments, as many as a quarter of people who have had a heart attack go on to have another heart attack or stroke-often with devastating consequences. "
NICE健康技术评价中心主任菲奥娜·朗森教授说:“尽管有有效的二级预防治疗,但是多达四分之一的心脏病发作者会再次心脏病发作或中风——经常是破坏性后果。”
The evidence shows that ticagrelor, in combination with aspirin, is effective at reducing the risk of further heart attacks and strokes in people who have already had a heart attack.
证据显示,ticagrel,加上阿司匹林,可以有效降低已经心脏病发作的人再度心脏病发作和中风的风险。

证据显示,ticagrel,加上阿司匹林,可以有效降低已经心脏病发作的人再度心脏病发作和中风的风险。

In provisionally recommending ticagrelor we are pleased to be able to increase the treatment options available to the many thousands of people who stand to benefit from it.
在临时推荐Ticagrelor时,我们很高兴能够增加可以从中获益的数千人的治疗选择。

Because information on the efficacy and safety of ticagrelor-particularly the risk of bleeding-beyond three years is limited, the draft guidance does not recommend treatment with it beyond that period.
由于关于ticagrel药疗效和安全性(特别是出血风险超过3年)的信息有限,指南草案不建议在该时期以后再用它治疗。
Because information about the efficacy and safety of ticagrelor-particularly the risk of bleeding-beyond three years is limited, the draft guidance does not recommend treatment with it beyond that period.
由于关于ticagrel药疗效和安全性(特别是出血风险超过三年)的信息有限,指导文件草案不建议在该时期以后再用它治疗。

A culture of political correctness has led to a blind eye being turned to widespread voting fraud in Muslim communities, a devastating government report reveals today.
一份破坏性政府报告显示,政治正确文化导致穆斯林社区普遍投票舞弊,人们对此视若无睹。

Ex-Cabinet minister Sir Eric Pickles lambasts the police, election watchdogs and town halls for ignoring evidence of election abuse because of " over-sensitivities about ethnicity and religion. "
前内阁部长埃里克·皮克勒爵士抨击警察、选举监督员和市政厅无视选举舞弊的证据,因为“对种族和宗教过于敏感”。
The former communities secretary, now the anti-corruption tsar, said the intimidation of voters on religious grounds was so bad that police should be allowed to put cordons outside polling stations to protect frightened voters.
现为反腐败沙皇的前社区秘书说,基于宗教理由对选民的恐吓非常严重,警察应该被允许在投票站外设置警戒线,以保护受惊吓的选民。

Sir Eric made 50 recommendations to clean up the system, including banning political activists from handling postal ballot papers to stop " vote harvesting. "
埃里克爵士提出了50项建议来清理这个系统,包括禁止政治活动人士处理邮递选票以停止“收割选票”。
Sir Eric made 50 recommendations to clean up the system, including banning political activists from handling mail ballot papers to stop " vote harvesting. "

银牌游泳运动员俄罗斯的尤莉亚·埃菲莫娃的皮肤和金发与演员安娜琳·麦科德相仿,而美国球队的内森·艾德里安则被球迷们说成是“约瑟夫·戈贡·莱维特的竞技版”。

French court rejects bid to demolish shops at Jungle refugee camp
法国法院驳回了拆毁丛林难民营商店的投标
French court rejects bid to demolish shops at Khan refugee camp
法国法院驳回拆除Khan难民营商店的投标
French court rejects bid to demolish shops at Village refugee camp

French court rejects bid to demolish shops at French refugee camp
法国法院驳回了拆除法国难民营商店的投标
French court rejects bid to demolish shops at Indian refugee camp
法国法院驳回了拆毁印度难民营商店的投标
French court rejects bid to demolish shops at Taliban refugee camp
法国法院拒绝拆除塔利班难民营商店的投标
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林难民营内成千上万难民居住的几十间临时商店和餐馆的投标。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shop and restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林营地数十间临时商店和餐馆的投标,那里有数千名难民居住。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops to restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林营地餐馆的数十间临时商店的要求,那里有数千名难民居住。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops a restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来州当局提出的拆除丛林营地的几十家临时餐馆的投标,那里有数千名难民。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops one restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来当局提出的拆除丛林难民营内一家餐馆的几十间临时商店的投标,那里有数千名难民。
A French court has rejected a bid by Calais authorities to demolish dozens of makeshift shops in restaurants in the Jungle camp where thousands of refugees are living.
一家法国法院拒绝了加来州当局提出的拆除丛林营地餐馆的数十间临时商店的投标,那里有数千名难民居住。
At a court hearing this week, Calais authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,加莱州当局称,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几分钱的基本膳食。
At a trial hearing this week, Calais authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的一次听证会上,加莱州当局称,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几口欧的零食。

At a court hearing the week, Calais authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的一次庭审中,加莱州当局称,国家应当能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供理发,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几口欧的零食。
At a court hearing this week, Lille authorities had argued the state should be able to knock down a total of 72 makeshift shops where people inside the camp sell goods, from cigarettes to energy drinks, offer haircuts, or sell tea for 50 cents ( 40p ) or basic meals for a few euros in makeshift restaurants.
在本周的法院听证会上,里尔政府称,国家应该能够淘汰营地内共72家临时商店,在这些商店里,人们出售商品,从香烟到能量饮料,提供发型,或以50美分的价格(40便士)卖茶叶,或在临时餐馆里卖几分钱的基本膳食。
The Calais prefect's office argued the places should be demolished because they represented a parallel economy that did not pay tax, and because they carried fire and sanitation risks.
加莱省省长办公室认为,这些地方应该拆除,因为它们代表着一种不纳税的平行经济,还因为它们带来了火灾和卫生风险。
The Lille prefect's office argued the places should be demolished because they represented a parallel economy that did not pay tax, and because they carried fire and sanitation risks.
里尔县长办公室认为,这些地方应该被拆毁,因为它们代表着一种不纳税的平行经济,还因为它们带来了火灾和卫生风险。

Humanitarian groups had told the court the shops and restaurants were vital, saying the free meals offered by a state-backed association and other groups did not provide enough food for the growing numbers at the camp.
人道主义 团体 告诉 法庭, 商店 和 餐馆 十分 重要, 他们 说, 一 个 国家 支持 的 协会 和 其他 团体 免费 提供 的 食物 不足 以 供 难民营 内 人数 日增 的 人 食用 。

人道主义团体告诉法庭,这些商店和餐馆至关重要,他们表示,一个由政府支持的协会和其他团体提供的免费膳食没有为难民营中越来越多的人提供足够的食物。

他们认为临时商店和餐馆经常为有需要的人提供住所和免费膳食。

A Lille court ruled there was no legal basis for expelling the people running the 72 makeshift shops, but said the Calais prefect's concerns " were totally understandable. "
里尔的一家法院裁定,驱逐72家临时商店的老板没有法律依据,但是他说,加来州长的担忧是完全可以理解的。

One of the places that had been under threat from demolition was the camp's Jungle Book Kids " Cafe which is run not-for-profit and provides 200 meals a day, English and French classes, and asylum advice for the hundreds of vulnerable unaccompanied minors in the camp.

Two charities, Help Refugees and L'Auberge des Migrants, on Friday estimated that numbers in the Jungle camp have risen to over 9, 000 people-the highest ever-after a steep increase in arrivals during the summer.
上周五,援助难民组织和移民协会(L'Auberge des Guigrants)估计,丛林难民营的人数已经上升至9000人以上,是夏季抵达人数急剧增长之后人数最多的一次。

the of August 8, Huayuan County had raised more than 21 million yuan of various relief funds this first half year for 13, 140 poverty-stricken students.
八月八日,华远县今年上半年共向13,140名贫困学生募集各种赈灾资金2,100多万元。
All poverty-stricken students of the county that should be supported have been supported financially.
县内所有应当得到资助的贫困学生都得到了财政资助。
All poverty-stricken students of the county that should be supported have been funded financially.
县内所有应当得到资助的贫困学生都得到了资金资助。

According to the Xinhua news agency, Australia's New South Wales government announced on the 11th day of the month that it will spend 200 million Australian dollars ( about 154 million US dollars ) to launch the biggest renovation on the famous Sydney Opera House since its establishment.
据新华社报道,澳大利亚新南威尔士州政府在本月第11天宣布,将花费2亿澳元(约合1.54亿美元)在悉尼歌剧院推出自其成立以来规模最大的翻新工程。
According to The Xinhua news agency, Australia's New South Wales government announced on the 11th day of the month that it will spend 200 million Australian dollars ( about 154 million US dollars ) to launch the biggest renovation on the famous Sydney Opera House since its establishment.

The Sydney Opera House is one of Sydney's landmark buildings, designed by Danish architect Jorn Utzon and built in 1973. It welcomes about 8 million visitors each year.
悉尼歌剧院是悉尼标志性建筑之一,由丹麦建筑师Jorn Utzon设计,建于1973年。

Non-permanent residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住六个月以上的非永久性居民,在北京有稳定合法的工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-permanent residents who have resided in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住六个月以上的非永久性居民,在北京有稳定合法的工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-permanent residents who have been in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住满六个月,在北京有稳定合法就业或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-resident residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住六个月以上的非居民居民,在北京有稳定合法的工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-direct residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住六个月以上的非直接居民,在北京有稳定合法的工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的,可以申请居留证。
Non-official residents who have lived in Beijing for more than six months and have a stable and legal employment or accommodation or conditions for continuous schooling in Beijing can apply for a residence permit.
在北京居住满六个月,在北京有稳定合法工作或者住宿条件或者继续教育条件的非官方居民,可以申请居留证。
Recently, the launch of implementation details of " Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " indicates that the " temporary residence permit " will be upgraded to " residence permit ".
最近,《居住证暂行条例》的实施细节的出台表明,"临时居住证"将升级为"居住证"。

in, the launch of implementation details of " Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " indicates that the " temporary residence permit " will be upgraded to " residence permit ".
在《居住证暂行条例》实施细则的推出,显示「临时居住证」将会提升为「居住证」。
A responsible person of the relevant department said that the transition from the " temporary residence permit " to " residence permit " means that Beijing will shift its administration for non-permanent residents from the " management " to multi-directional services.
有关部门负责人表示,从“临时居留证”向“居留证”的过渡,意味着北京将把对非永久性居民的管理从“管理”转向多方向服务。
A responsible officer of the relevant department said that the transition from the " temporary residence permit " to " residence permit " means that Beijing will shift its administration for non-permanent residents from the " management " to multi-directional services.

" The credit repair mechanism is an important milestone in the construction of the tax credit system and even the credit system of the whole society, which indicates that the construction of our social credit system is becoming more and more mature. "
信用修复机制是我国税收信用体系乃至整个社会信用体系建设的重要里程碑,它表明我国社会信用体系建设日趋成熟。
" the credit repair mechanism is an important milestone in the construction of the tax credit system and even the credit system of the whole society, which indicates that the construction of our social credit system is becoming more and more mature. "
信用修复机制是构建全社会税收信用体系乃至信用体系的重要里程碑,标志着我国社会信用体系建设日趋成熟。

" The credit recovery mechanism is an important milestone in the construction of the tax credit system and even the credit system of the whole society, which indicates that the construction of our social credit system is becoming more and more mature. "

" Environmental problems are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
“环境问题是由大气、水和土壤污染造成的,但其根源仍然在于生产方式和生活方式。”
" Environmental problem are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
环境问题主要表现在大气、水和土壤污染上,但其根源仍然在于生产方式和生活方式。
" Environment problems are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
环境问题主要表现在大气、水和土壤污染上,但其根源仍然在于生产方式和生活方式。
" Resource problems are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
“资源问题是大气、水和土壤污染造成的,但根源还在于生产方式和生活方式。”
" Water problems are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
水问题是大气、水和土壤污染造成的,但其根源仍然在于生产方式和生活方式。
" Resources problems are embodied by the atmosphere, water and soil pollution, but the root still lies in the mode of production and living. "
“资源问题是大气、水和土壤污染造成的,但根源还在于生产方式和生活方式。”

( This newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. More than 180 Shanghai enterprises were invited to participate. More than 20 Hu-Tong industry docking projects worth at least RMB 100 million saw on-site signing.
本月十日,南通市政府在上海国际会议中心开展了一系列合作活动,邀请了180多家上海企业参加。
( This Newspaper ) On the 10th day of the month, the Nantong Municipal Government held a series of cooperation activities at the Shanghai International Convention Center. 青岛是中国第12位,也是山东首个使用和交易废气的试验城市。
Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first experimental city to use and trade emissions.
青岛是中国第12位,也是山东首个使用和交易废气的实验城市。
Qingdao is China's 12th and also Shandong's first prototype city to use and trade emissions.
青岛是中国的第12位,也是山东首个使用和交易废气的原型城市。
On the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月第11日,许多公司来到青岛市排放交易中心提交废气排放认购单,接受后须支付费用。
in the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月十一日,多间公司前往青岛市排放交易中心提交排放认购书,接受后须缴交费用。
the the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
本月十一日,多间公司来到青岛市排放交易中心,提交废气排放认购单。接受后,须缴交费用。
of the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
于本月十一日,多间公司前往青岛市排放交易中心提交排放认购书,接受后须缴交费用。
and the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
及本月十一日,多间公司前往青岛市排放交易中心提交排放认购书。接受后,须缴交费用。
to the 11th day of the month, many companies came to the Qingdao Municipal Emissions Trading Center to submit emissions subscription. After acceptance, they shall pay fees.
截至本月十一日,多间公司来到青岛市排放交易中心,提交排放认购书。接受后,须缴交费用。
The upcoming first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
即将到来的首次单笔交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,这也是山东首个排放量交易,也是中国首个城市级排放量交易。
The planned first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
计划中的首次单项交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,这也是山东首个排放量交易,也是中国首个城市级排放量交易。
The expected first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
预期的首笔交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,也将是山东首个排放量交易和中国首个城市级排放量交易。
The anticipated first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.

The announced first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
首次公布的单项交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,这也是山东首个排放量交易,也是中国首个城市级排放量交易。
The ongoing first single transaction also indicates that Qingdao emissions trading pilot officially kicked off. It will also be the first emissions trading in Shandong and the first city-level emissions trading in China.
正在进行的第一笔交易也表明,青岛排放量交易试点正式启动,这也是山东首个排放量交易,也是中国首个城市级排放量交易。

According to the collection standard determined by Qingdao price bureau and financial sector, the estimated initial emission fee is about 641, 200 yuan. The working staff will finish review within 7 working days.

The project is a mechanical processing enterprise. Its initial emission rate for the chemical oxygen demand ( COD ) and ammonia ( NOX ) are 0. 514 tons / year and 0. 052 tons / year, respectively.

The paid use and trading of Air Pollutant Emission Permits cover the city's key industrial enterprises for the production and supply of electricity and heat.
空气污染物排放许可证的有偿使用和交易覆盖了该市主要工业企业的电力和热能的生产和供应。
The direct use and trading of Air Pollutant Emission Permits cover the city's key industrial enterprises for the production and supply of electricity and heat.

The free use and trading of Air Pollutant Emission Permits cover the city's key industrial enterprises for the production and supply of electricity and heat.

The obtaining of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
获得补偿排放权不等于获得非法排放,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。
The obtained of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
补偿排放权的取得不等于非法排放的取得,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。

the obtaining of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
获得补偿排放权不等于获得非法排放,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。
and obtaining of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.
获得补偿排放权不等于获得非法排放,因此公司不得随意排放污染物。
to obtaining of compensated emission right is not equal to the obtaining of illegal discharge, so companies cannot discharge pollutants at will.

Han Hongyan, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via purchasing emission rights.
青岛市环保局副局长韩宏仁介绍说,违法和超量排污企业必须按照有关法律法规受到处罚,不得允许违法企业通过购买排放权规避处罚。
Han Hong Qi, deputy director of Qingdao Environmental Protection Bureau, introduces that companies of illegal and excessive sewage must be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and regulations. Illegal enterprises cannot be allowed to circumvent punishment via purchasing emission rights.
青岛市环保局副局长韩宏琪介绍说,违法和过度排污的企业必须按照有关法律法规进行处罚,不得允许违法企业通过购买排放权规避处罚。

With the economic interests drive, to reduce pollutants'discharge has shifted from the government's mandatory behavior into a conscious market behavior, so as to truly protect the environment, nature and public health.

Emission right, also known as " dumping right ", means the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.
排放权,又称“倾弃权”,是指排放污染物的权利,是指排放者在政府规定的配额内依法向环境排放污染物的权利。
Emission rights, also known as " dumping right ", means the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.
排放权,又称“倾弃权”,是指污染物排放权,指排放者在政府规定的配额内依法向环境排放污染物的权利。
Emission right, sometimes known as " dumping right ", means the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.
排放权,有时被称为“倾弃权”,是指排放污染物的权利,是指排放者在政府规定的配额内依法向环境排放污染物的权利。
Emission right, also known as " dumping right ", refers the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.

Emission right, also known as " dumping right ", is the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.
排放权,又称“倾弃权”,是排放污染物的权利,是指排放者在政府规定的配额内依法向环境排放污染物的权利。
Emission right, also referred as " dumping right ", means the right to discharge pollutants. It refers to the right for emitters to discharge pollutants to the environment in line with the law within the quota assigned by the government.
排放权,又称“倾弃权”,是指污染物排放权,指排放者在政府规定的配额内依法向环境排放污染物的权利。
This right is essentially the right of the emitters to occupy, use and benefit from environmental capacity resources.
这项权利实质上是排放者占有、使用和受益于环境能力资源的权利。
the right is essentially the right of the emitters to occupy, use and benefit from environmental capacity resources.
这项权利实质上是排放者占有、使用和利用环境能力资源并从中获益的权利。

Next, under the premise that the total discharge of pollutants does not exceed the total allowable emission volume, the internal resources of pollution began to swap discharge capacities via currency exchange.
接着,在污染物排放总量不超过总允许排放量的前提下,内部污染资源开始通过货币交换交换交换排放容量。

Since the proposition of emissions trading by American economist Dyers in 1968, it has been applied by the United States of America to the management of atmospheric and river pollution sources since the 1970s.
自美国经济学家戴尔斯1968年提出排放权交易以来,美利坚合众国自1970年代以来就一直将其用于大气和河流污染源的管理。
Since to proposition of emissions trading by American economist Dyers in 1968, it has been applied by the United States of America to the management of atmospheric and river pollution sources since the 1970s.

On February 22 this year, the United States and Russia reached a ceasefire agreement on the Syrian conflict. The ceasefire agreement will be implemented since February 27.
今年2月22日,美国和俄罗斯就叙利亚冲突达成了停火协议,停火协议将在2月27日开始实施。

Under the agreement, the ceasefire does not include a military strike against terrorist organizations including " Islamic State " and " Salvation Front ", which were identified by the United Nation Security Council.

将继续在基地内建立有关军事基础设施,俄罗斯士兵的生活条件将受到相应的保护。

In fact, the relationship between the village and the city should companionship with, just like mother and child. No matter strong or weak. There is no need for any party to be governed by the other party. Such a relationship is warm.
事实上,村庄和城市的关系应该像母亲和孩子一样,与母亲和孩子相伴。无论强弱,都不必让任何一方受对方的支配。这种关系是温和的。
In of, the relationship between the village and the city should companionship with, just like mother and child. No matter strong or weak. There is no need for any party to be governed by the other party. Such a relationship is warm.

There is no fixed pattern of rural development, but it is quite difficult to just rely on spontaneous rural changes. One of the most important changes is to let the right people go to villages.

the is no fixed pattern of rural development, but it is quite difficult to just rely on spontaneous rural changes. One of the most important changes is to let the right people go to villages.

a is no fixed pattern of rural development, but it is quite difficult to just rely on spontaneous rural changes. One of the most important changes is to let the right people go to villages.

in is no fixed pattern of rural development, but it is quite difficult to just rely on spontaneous rural changes. One of the most important changes is to let the right people go to villages.

Shanghai Songjiang District Traffic Control Department recently used electronic police to monitor whether the driver plays mobile phone while driving. As a result, more than 30 cases were detected in a week.
上海松江区交通管制部门最近使用电子警察来监控司机驾驶时是否使用手机,结果一周内共发现30多起。
Shanghai Tangjiang District Traffic Control Department recently used electronic police to monitor whether the driver plays mobile phone while driving. As a result, more than 30 cases were detected in a week.
上海市唐江区交通管制处最近使用电子警察来监测司机驾驶时是否使用手机,结果一周内共发现30多起。

With the popularity of smart phones, mobile phones become more and more funny. WeChat, microblogging and even games, shopping on Taobao have become normal. It seems that many people cannot leave the phone for a moment, and cannot stop even when driving.
随着智能手机的普及,手机越来越滑稽了。WeChat、微博甚至游戏,在淘宝购物已经司空见惯了,似乎很多人暂时不能离开手机,即使在开车的时候也停不下来。

According to " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior preventing safe driving ".
根据《道路交通安全法》,手机游戏被禁止,并被定义为 “ 阻止安全驾驶的行为 ”.
According as " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior preventing safe driving ".
根据《道路交通安全法》,手机游戏被禁止,并被定义为 “ 阻止安全驾驶的行为 ”.
According of " Road Traffic Safety Act ", mobile phones playing are banned and defined as " behavior preventing safe driving ".

If the traffic control department can be determined to declare war to the mobile phone playing behavior while driving and normalize such measures, such illegal behaviors will surely be curbed.
如果交通管制部门下定决心对手机游戏行为宣战,同时驾驶和规范此类措施,则此类非法行为必将受到遏制。

The public security organ shall be strict with household registration management by gradually establishing electronic and paper files for people without Hukou ( household registration ) and ensure the completeness and validity.
公安机关对户口管理应当严格,逐步建立户口无户口人电子文件和纸件档案,保证完整有效。

In the collective greenhouse of Donglin village of Taicang City, the 48-year-old Wang Xuefen is leading workers to pear spray pesticides on pear trees.
在太仓市东林村集体温室,48岁的王学芬带领工人在梨树上喷洒农药。

Last year, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
去年,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
Last month, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
上个月,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
Last season, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
上个季度,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
Last 2016, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
2016年,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
Last 2010, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
到2010年,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
Last 2014, the income of Donglin village reached RMB 22 million, of which total agricultural income accounted for nearly a half.
到2014年,东林村收入达到2200万元人民币,其中农业总收入近半。
According to Su Qifang, the village secretary, per capita land cultivation area increases each year. 50 mu ( a unit of area, one " mu " = 0. 0667 hectares ) in the beginning and over 100 mu now. The revenue per mu increases every year and the income of professional farmers also have room for growth every year.
据村长苏齐芳说,人均土地种植面积逐年增加,初期为50亩(单位面积:亩=0.667公顷),现在为100亩以上,每亩收入逐年增加,专业农户的收入每年也有增长空间。

With shares quantifying to each villager, the highlight of the rural collective economic reform is to be clear about the property rights of rural collective management and exploring political and economic separation.
通过对每个村民份额的量化,农村集体经济改革的亮点是明确农村集体经营的产权和探索政治与经济分离。

In July 2015, on Anzhen Street of Wuxi Xishan District, 14 rural economic cooperation organizations worked with the village committee to implement " sub-account management ". The village committee implemented rural public affairs management while the cooperative organizations were mainly engaged in business.
2015年7月,在无锡西山地区安镇街,14个农村经济合作组织与村委会合作实施“分户管理”,村委会实施农村公共事务管理,合作社主要从事经营活动。

Zhu Baoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱保平表示,江苏政府的下一步工作是继续推进社区合作体制改革,鼓励农民共同发展和建立村级民主权力运行机制。
Zhu Daoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱多平表示,江苏省政府下一步将继续推进社区合作体制改革,鼓励农民联合发展,建立村级民主权力运行机制。
Zhu Jioping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱家平表示,江苏政府的下一步工作是继续推进社区协作体制改革,鼓励农民共同发展和建立村级民主权力运行机制。
Zhu Shuoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.

江苏省农业委员会副主任朱齐平表示,江苏政府的下一步工作是继续推进社区协作体制改革,鼓励农民共同发展和建立村级民主权力运行机制。
Zhu Boyoping, deputy director of the Jiangsu Provincial Agriculture Committee, said that the next step of Jiangsu government is to continue to promote the reform of community cooperation system, encourage farmers to jointly develop and establish a village-level democratic power operation mechanism.
江苏省农业委员会副主任朱博平表示,江苏省政府下一步将继续推进社区合作体制改革,鼓励农民联合发展,建立村级民主权力运行机制。
According to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
朱保平认为,应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行修正,并产生明确的产权。
According said Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
朱保平表示,他们应进一步推动改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行修正,并产生明确的产权。
of to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
对朱保平来说,要进一步推进改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并产生明确的产权。
the to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
到朱保平,他们要进一步推进改革,参与社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行修正,并产生明确的产权。
and to Zhu Baoping, they should further move forward the reform, engage in community shares cooperation, quantify the assets to members, fix it to farmers and produce clear property rights.
并对朱保平进一步推进改革,开展社区共享合作,对成员资产进行量化,对农民进行整顿,并产生明确的产权。

Xiamen girl Zhang Binbin : " handsome hands " encourage her to enter shooting career, which saw several " reverse "

Zhang Donghong, a villager of the East Park Village, Xiamen Xiang'an District, changed his 29-inch old TV into a 65-inch TV just a few days before.
张东宏是厦门乡东公园村的村民,几天前把他29英寸的旧电视改成了65英寸的电视机。

The ordinary girl has a daughter, named Zhang Binbin. She is the one to win sanzi final silver medal of Olympic Games Women's 50-meters rifle games for China in the evening of the eleventh.

In the evening of the 11th day of the month, just in front of this new TV set, the Zhang Donghong couple and their dozens of relatives and friends have witnessed the magic process for the couple's daughter to catch up and reverse from almost being eliminated in the preliminaries to almost winning.
月11日晚上,就在这台新电视机前,张东红夫妇和他们的数十个亲戚和朋友见证了这对夫妇女儿的神奇过程,从几乎在预演中被淘汰到几乎获胜。
In the evening of the 11th day of the month, just in front of this new television set, the Zhang Donghong couple and their dozens of relatives and friends have witnessed the magic process for the couple's daughter to catch up and reverse from almost being eliminated in the preliminaries to almost winning.
月11日晚上,就在这台新电视机前,张东红夫妇及其数十名亲戚和朋友见证了这对夫妇女儿的神奇过程,即追赶和扭转,从几乎在预演中被淘汰到几乎取胜。
At the game, Zhang Binbin was ranked in the middle and lower reaches and it seemed she was still quite far away from the final.
在这场比赛中,张斌被评为中下,她似乎离决赛还很远。

But her parents and friends did not give up, kept watching the live and saw other players finish the game. Zhang Binbin raised her ranks all the way and finally came to the final. At this time, a burst of cheers broke out in her home.

This year, the 27-year-old Zhang Binbin, in the 16-year shooting career, has actually missed the silver medal for several times.

The 719 heavy rainfall caused heavy disaster to many cities of Hebei Province and resulted in the flood disaster of some regions in Hebei province. During the period, some people were dead and missing.
719年的强降雨量对河北省许多城市造成了重大灾害,并导致河北省部分地区发生洪水灾害,在此期间,有的人死亡,有的失踪。

to 719 heavy rainfall caused heavy disaster to many cities of Hebei Province and resulted in the flood disaster of some regions in Hebei province. During the period, some people were dead and missing.
到719年,大雨对河北省许多城市造成重大灾害,并导致河北省部分地区发生洪水灾害,在此期间,有的人死亡,有的失踪。
The good man " Lao Tie " sacrificed his life when he helped the community on drainage, leaving a 2-year-old kid and a wife with child. The moving story of the good man " Lao Tie " made the entire provincial capital moved.
那位好汉“老铁”在帮助社区排水时献出了自己的生命,留下一个两岁的孩子和一个带着孩子的妻子,“老铁”的动人故事使整个省会都动了起来。

On August 4, the working personnel of Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund and volunteers of Hebei Brand Association came to his home and offered his relatives with 3, 200-yuan love donation.
八月四日,河北省慈秀基金的工作人员和河北品牌协会的志愿者来到自己的家,为自己的亲人赠送了三千二百元的爱。

Hebei Provincial Cixiao Fund, known as Cixiao Fund of the Hebei Volunteer Service Foundation, was initiated by the Hebei Brand Preparatory Committee, and established in August 2015.
河北省慈秀基金,又称河北义工服务基金会慈秀基金,由河北品牌筹备委员会发起,于2015年8月成立。
inbei Provincial Cixiao Fund, known as Cixiao Fund of the Hebei Volunteer Service Foundation, was initiated by the Hebei Brand Preparatory Committee, and established in August 2015.

According to a Hong Kong Oriental Daily report made on August 12, the current diamond sales in Mainland China were accused of three major problems, including the false marking of diamond clarity to raise sales price, false diamond weight and unguaranteed aftersales, etc.
根据香港东方日报8月12日的报导,目前中国大陆的钻石销售被指责存在三个主要问题,包括提高销售价格的假钻石标识、假钻石重量和假售后售等。
According to a Hong Kong Oriental Daily report made in August 12, the current diamond sales in Mainland China were accused of three major problems, including the false marking of diamond clarity to raise sales price, false diamond weight and unguaranteed aftersales, etc.

Antwerp is one of the world's largest diamond trading centers. The diamond cutting technology of local artisans is well-known. All diamonds on sale have undergone rigorous identification, deeply welcomed by the mainland ladies.
安特卫普是世界上最大的钻石交易中心之一,当地手工工匠的钻石切割技术是众所周知的,所有出售的钻石都经过严谨的鉴定,深受大陆女性的欢迎。

" A small cloth bag, holding in one's hand, such light-weighted, is worth of almost one million yuan ", a woman surnamed Liu who participated in the purchase of diamonds told of her experience in Antwerp last June to the mainland media.
一位名叫刘的女士向大陆媒体透露了去年六月在安特卫普的经历,她手里拿着一个轻便的布袋,价值近100万元。

She buried the diamond in her lingerie and carried it all day along, including when she went to toilet and took bath.

She said the diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普买的钻石每克售价5万5千元,在厦门,同样质量的钻石零售价11万1千元。
She said a diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.

She said an diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.

She said one diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普买的一颗钻石每克售价约55,000元,在厦门,同样质量的钻石零售价约111,000元。
She said that diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普买的钻石每克售价5万5千元,在厦门,同样质量的钻石零售价11万1千元。
She said each diamond she bought in Antwerp was priced about RMB 55, 000 per gram and diamond of the same quality was retail-priced about RMB 111, 000 in Xia'men.
她说,她在安特卫普购买的每颗钻石的售价是每克5万5千元人民币,而在厦门,同样质量的钻石的零售价是每公斤11万1千元人民币。
Recently, she sold the diamond with 120 % more than the price she bought and earned two hundred thousand yuan.
最近, 她以比她购买的价格高出120%的价格卖出了这颗钻石,赚了20万元.
and, she sold the diamond with 120 % more than the price she bought and earned two hundred thousand yuan.

她卖钻石的价格比她购买的价格高出120%,赚了20万元。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在出入境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石会被归类为走私,可判以监禁。
According by the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,进出境时,须申报钻石。否则,该钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According under the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石会被归类为走私,可判以监禁。
According per the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石会被归类为走私,可判以监禁。
According to the regulations of the Mainland Customs, diamonds are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According to the provisions of the Mainland Customs, diamond are neither supplies nor necessities during the trip and thus belong to the scope of goods. So such diamond should be declared at entry and exit. Otherwise, it shall be classified as smuggling. People may be sentenced to jail.
根据内地海关的规定,钻石在旅途中既不是供应,也不是必需品,因此属于货品范围。因此,在进出境时,应申报钻石。否则,该钻石可列为走私品,可判以监禁。
According to foreign media reports, on the 10th day of the month of the local time, the British Prime Minister's Downing Street announced that British Prime Minister Teresa Mei will go to Switzerland to spend the summer vacation, but did not disclose the specific place.

According to some media, after the British referendum off Europe, the new British Prime Minister chose to spend her vacation on the " neutral country ", Swiss on the European continent. This is symbolic.

The British " Guardian " commented that the symbolic neutrality nature of the Swiss played a role in the choice of the British Prime Minister's first resort.

On June 23, the British held a referendum for Brexit, but the British new prime minister did not want to start the article 50, which is involved with the Lisbon Treaty before the end of the year.
6月23日,英国举行了英国退欧全民公投,但英国新任首相并不想在年底前启动有关《里斯本条约》的第50条。
On June 21, the British held a referendum for Brexit, but the British new prime minister did not want to start the article 50, which is involved with the Lisbon Treaty before the end of the year.

There are 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1 325个,在安徽省位居首位。
There have 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1 325个,在安徽省位居首位。
There total 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1 325个,在安徽省排名第一。
There were 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1 325个,其数量和数量在安徽省名列前茅。
There project 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1,325个,在安徽省位居首位。
There there 1, 325 existing intangible cultural heritage projects in Huangshan. Its number and quantity ranked first in Anhui province.
黄山现有非物质文化遗产项目1 325个,在安徽省位居首位。
As the inheritance of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产的继承主要依靠口语和面对面的交流,许多非物质文化遗产的继承项目正处在前世遗留下来的边缘,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。
As the endowment of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产项目的捐赠主要依靠口语和面对面的交流,许多非物质文化遗产项目几乎无法从过去世代传承,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。
As the origin of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产项目的起源主要依靠口语和面对面的交流,许多非物质文化遗产项目都处于前世遗留下来的边缘,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。
As the acquisition of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产项目的收购主要靠口语和面对面的通道进行,许多非物质文化遗产项目几乎是祖辈辈传下来的,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。
As the expression of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产项目主要靠口语和面对面的交流来表达,许多非物质文化遗产项目近乎无法传承,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。
As the collection of intangible cultural heritage projects of Anhui province mainly relies on oral and face-to-face passage, many intangible cultural heritage projects are on the verge of failing to be handed down from past generations. So the application of digital technology for conservation is imperative.
由于安徽省非物质文化遗产项目的收集主要依靠口语和面对面的通道,许多非物质文化遗产项目几乎无法从过去世代传承,因此应用数字技术进行保护势在必行。

According in the work plan of the Standing Committee of the Provincial People's Congress this year, the Standing Committee plans to listen to the deliberation of special work report, and carry out the implementation of banking supervision and management law and special inquiry of serving local economic development.
根据省人民代表大会常务委员会今年的工作计划,常务委员会计划听取专门工作报告的审议,实施银行业监督管理法,对地方经济发展情况进行专门调查。
In mid-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
8月中旬,常务委员会将组织两个研究小组在一些城市开展研究,为这次特别调查作准备。
In late-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
8月 下旬, 常设 委员会 将 组织 两 个 研究 小组 在 一些 城市 进行 研究, 为 特别 调查 作 好 准备 。
In early-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
八月初,常务委员会将组织两个研究小组,在一些城市进行研究,为这次特别调查作准备。
in mid-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
在八月中旬,常务委员会将组织两个研究小组在一些城市进行研究,为特别调查作好准备。
of mid-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
由八月中旬起,常务委员会将组织两个研究小组在一些城市进行研究,为特别调查作好准备。
to mid-August, the Standing Committee will organize two research groups to conduct research in some cities to prepare for the special inquiry.
至八月中为止,常务委员会将组织两个研究小组,在一些城市进行研究,为特别调查作好准备。
Hua Jianhui pointed out that this was the first time that the Standing Committee of the Provincial People's Congress listened to and deliberated on the special work report of vertical administration department and carry out special inquiries. It is the active exploration for enhancing and exploring the supervision work of the Provincial People's Congress.
华建汇指出,这是省人民代表大会常务委员会第一次听取和审议垂直行政主管部门的专项工作报告,开展专项调查,是加强和探索省人民代表大会监督工作的热点。

In the director department of Kashi, Xinjiang, with the order of the director, the armed police in three regions, namely Kashi, Hotan and Aksu, followed the order quickly, implemented motor-driven and left for the exercise combat zone.
在新疆喀什省,武装警察按照省长的命令,在卡什、热丹和阿克苏三个地区迅速执行命令,用机动车驱动,然后前往战斗演习区。

China's Mars exploration launch target is to step around, land and patrol at one time. Such task has considerable difficulty.

Because the Mars probe can encounter a time window in 26 months, experts are closely working on the project plan and try to launch the first Mars probe in 2020.
由于火星探测器在26个月中会遇到一个时间窗口,所以专家正紧密合作项目计划,并试图在2020年启动第一个火星探测器。

According to Xu Dazhe, although China's aircraft has entered a deep space, it is still essential to finish the task of Mars exploration. The detection of Mars means that China has stepped into the deep space exploration era in a true sense.
徐大和说,虽然中国的飞机已经进入了一个很深的太空,但是完成火星探测任务还是很必要的,对火星的探测意味着中国已经进入了一个真正意义上的探索太空的时代。

" Every two or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔两三年,火星就有可能与地球距离最近,而此时,运载火箭的发射最为节能。
" Every four or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔四三年,火星就有可能与地球距离最近,而此时,运载火箭的发射效率最高。
" Every six or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔六三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,运载火箭的发射最为节能。
" Every five or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔五三年,火星就有可能与地球距离最近,而此时,运载火箭的发射效率最高。
" Every ten or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每十年或三年,火星就有可能与地球最接近,而此时,运载火箭的发射最为节能。
" Every three or three years, there is a chance that Mars is closest to Earth. And at this point, it is most energy efficient to launch the vehicle. "
每隔三三年,火星就有可能与地球距离最近,而此时,运载火箭的发射效率最高。
" Taking into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,中国长征五号运载火箭将完成发射任务。
" In into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,完成发射任务将是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。
" The into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
从火星探测器的质量来看,完成发射任务是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。
" I into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,完成发射任务是中国长征五号运载火箭的任务。
" in into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
考虑到火星探测器的质量,中国的长征五号运载火箭将完成发射任务。
" to into account the mass of Mars detectors, it will be the job of China's Long March 5 carrier rocket to complete the launch mission. "
“考虑到火星探测器的质量,中国长征五号运载火箭将完成发射任务。”
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
China's Mars exploring mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.

China's Mars expedition mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探险任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但落地失败了。
China's Mars discovery mission aims to achieve surrounding, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星发现任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有一次环绕和降落在外国,但着陆失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve surrounded, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在实现环绕、降落和巡逻的目标,这在外国从未发生过,以前有一次环绕和降落在外国,但是降落失败了。
China's Mars exploration mission aims to achieve trapping, landing and patrolling at one time, which has never occurred in foreign countries. There was one time of surrounding and landing before in foreign countries, but the landing failed.
中国的火星探测任务旨在一次完成捕捉、着陆和巡逻任务,这在外国从未发生过,以前曾有过一次环绕和降落在外国,但这次着陆失败了。
Mars exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive feature compared with the general space detector.
火星探测涉及许多技术领域,特别是,虽然探测器是一种空间探测器,但它与一般的空间探测器相比具有显著的特征。
of exploration involves a lot of technical areas. In particular, although the rover is a space detector, it has a distinctive feature compared with the general space detector.

换句话说,火星探测器应当能够确定行驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。

换句话说,火星探测器应该能够确定行驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。
In a words, the Mars probe should be capable of determining the driving route and equipped with the ability to find obstacles.
简言之,火星探测器应当能够确定行驶路线,并具备发现障碍的能力。
According to Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩认为,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According by Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩认为,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According says Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩说,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According wrote Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩写道,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According stated Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩说,人类之所以偏好火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
According said Pang Zhihao, a researcher of the fifth institute of China's Aerospace Science and Technology Group, the reason for human being to favor Mars exploration is because Mars detection has significant scientific and technical meanings and it even matters to the future of human beings.
中国航空航天科技集团第五研究所的研究员彭志浩说,人类之所以偏爱火星探测,是因为火星探测具有重要的科技意义,甚至对人类的未来都很重要。
Currently, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
目前,火星已经成为人类研究程度最高的行星,人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
of, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
in, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.

the, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.

to, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
and, the Mars has become the planet with the highest degree of human research. The history of human beings to use space detectors for Mars exploration almost goes across the entire history of human space exploration.
火星已经成为人类研究水平最高的行星,人类利用太空探测器探测火星的历史几乎贯穿人类太空探索的整个历史。
Therefore, the human beings hope that one day on the Mars to establish a base of residence, and ultimately to Mars immigration, it turned into a second home of mankind.
因此,人类希望有一天在火星上建立一个居住基地,最终进入火星移民,它会变成人类的第二个家园。

the, the human beings hope that one day on the Mars to establish a base of residence, and ultimately to Mars immigration, it turned into a second home of mankind.
人类希望有一天,在火星上建立一个居住基地,最终到火星移民,它会变成人类的第二个家园。
to, the human beings hope that one day on the Mars to establish a base of residence, and ultimately to Mars immigration, it turned into a second home of mankind.

A large number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,除非经过数十亿年的演化而进入薄薄、低温、水枯竭等大气层。
A large series of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,仅在经过数十亿年的大气演化后,火星才变得薄、低温、水分枯竭等等。
A great number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.

A extensive number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.
大量迹象还表明,火星很可能与现在的地球相同,除非经过数十亿年的演化,才进入薄、低温、水枯竭等大气层。
A strong number of signs also show that the Mars is likely to be the same as the current Earth, only after billions of years of evolution into the atmosphere thin, low temperature, water depletion and so on.

Therefore, the detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help propose a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星上探测或载人着陆可有助于提出预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。
Therefore, a detection or manned landing on the Mars for research can help propose a pre-arranged planning to prevent the earth from becoming the second Mars which is difficult for human beings to inhabit.
因此,为研究目的在火星进行探测或载人着陆可有助于提出预先安排的计划,以防止地球成为人类难以居住的第二颗火星。

As of June 2016, the world conducted a total of 114 lunar explorations, including 43 Mars detection missions.
截至2016年6月,全世界共进行了114次月球探测,包括43次火星探测任务。

There are currently five Mars orbiters and two Mars rovers at work, but only one lunar orbiter and one lunar lander are at work.
目前有5个火星轨道飞行器和2个火星探测器在工作,但只有1个月球轨道飞行器和1个月球登陆器在工作。

World space powers have developed a detection plan with the Mars system as target. So we can see the current Mars detection is hotter than that of moon detection.
世界空间强国已经制定了一个以火星系统作为目标的探测计划,因此我们可以看到当前的火星探测比月球探测更热。

On Nov. 5, 2013, India launched the first Mars probe " Mangalian ", and has become Asia's first country for successful detection of the Mars.
2013年11月5日,印度发射了第一艘火星探测器“曼加里安号”,成为亚洲第一个成功探测火星的国家。
in Nov. 5, 2013, India launched the first Mars probe " Mangalian ", and has become Asia's first country for successful detection of the Mars.
2013年11月5日,印度发射了第一颗火星探测器“曼加里安探测器”,成为亚洲第一个成功探测火星的国家。
of Nov. 5, 2013, India launched the first Mars probe " Mangalian ", and has become Asia's first country for successful detection of the Mars.

to Nov. 5, 2013, India launched the first Mars probe " Mangalian ", and has become Asia's first country for successful detection of the Mars.
截至2013年11月5日,印度发射了第一颗火星探测器“曼加里安探测器”,并成为亚洲第一个成功探测火星的国家。
" Mangalian " is used to study the surface, the atmosphere and mineral characteristics of the Mars and explore whether there are signs of methane and life on the Mars.
“曼加利安号”用来研究火星的表面、大气层和矿物特性,并研究火星是否有甲烷和生命的迹象。
" Mangalian " is used will study the surface, the atmosphere and mineral characteristics of the Mars and explore whether there are signs of methane and life on the Mars.

The hardest part of the mission is that the probe just has one chance before entering the Martian atmosphere for aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration.
任务中最难的部分是探测器在进入火星大气层之前只有一次气动形状和降落伞减速的机会。

The atmospheric pressure of the Mars is very low, only 1 % of the Earth's surface atmospheric pressure, with high uncertainty.

科学家们还没有完全了解火星的变化和风暴特性等因素。
Scientists have not had a thorough understanding of Mars factors such to its changes and storm characteristics.
科学家们还没有完全了解火星的各种因素,比如它的变化和风暴的特点。
Scientists have not had a thorough understanding of Mars factors such that its changes and storm characteristics.
科学家们对于火星的各种因素还没有完全的了解,以致于火星的变化和风暴的特点。
A dust storm similar to the Earth's dust is often formed in the Mars in the summer, which will lead to a sharp decline in solar energy. So a " sleep " mode must be designed for the Mars rover and let it wait patiently until the disappearance of dust storms.
夏季火星上经常形成类似于地球尘埃的沙尘暴,导致太阳能急剧下降,因此必须为火星漫游者设计一种“睡眠”模式,让它耐心地等待,直到尘暴消失。
A dust storm similar with the Earth's dust is often formed in the Mars in the summer, which will lead to a sharp decline in solar energy. So a " sleep " mode must be designed for the Mars rover and let it wait patiently until the disappearance of dust storms.
夏季火星上常常形成一种与地球尘埃相似的尘暴,导致太阳能量急剧下降,因此必须为火星漫游者设计一种“睡眠”模式,让它耐心地等待,直到尘暴消失。
A dust storm similar of the Earth's dust is often formed in the Mars in the summer, which will lead to a sharp decline in solar energy. So a " sleep " mode must be designed for the Mars rover and let it wait patiently until the disappearance of dust storms.
夏季火星上常常形成类似于地球尘埃的尘埃风暴,导致太阳能急剧下降,因此必须为火星漫游者设计一种“睡眠”模式,让它耐心地等待,直到尘埃暴消失。
A dust storm similar like the Earth's dust is often formed in the Mars in the summer, which will lead to a sharp decline in solar energy. So a " sleep " mode must be designed for the Mars rover and let it wait patiently until the disappearance of dust storms.

At the same time, the Martian atmosphere has a reducing effect on sunlight, which poses a problem for the energy supply for Mars detection.
同时,火星大气层对太阳光有减退效应,对火星探测的能源供应构成问题。

同时,火星大气层对太阳光有减退效应,对火星探测的能量供应构成问题。
and the same time, the Martian atmosphere has a reducing effect on sunlight, which poses a problem for the energy supply for Mars detection.
同时,火星大气层对日光有降低效应,对火星探测的能量供应构成问题。
At the same time, the Martian atmosphere has a reducing effect on sunlight, which presents a problem for the energy supply for Mars detection.
同时,火星大气层对日照有降低效应,对火星探测的能量供应构成问题。
This requires that the detector's sun wing area to be larger, and need to constantly adjust, and strive to align with the sun direction.
这需要探测器的太阳翼面积更大,需要不断调整,并努力与太阳的方向一致。
This requires that the detector's sun wing area to be larger, and need to continually adjust, and strive to align with the sun direction.

This requires that the detector's sun wing area to be larger, and need to constantly angle, and strive to align with the sun direction.
这就要求探测器的太阳翼面积要大一些,需要不断的角度,并努力与太阳的方向对齐。
and requires that the detector's sun wing area to be larger, and need to constantly adjust, and strive to align with the sun direction.
并且要求探测器的太阳翼面积要更大,需要不断调整,并努力与太阳的方向一致。

要求探测器的太阳翼面积更大,需要不断调整,并努力与太阳的方向一致。
In addition, since the gravity of the Mars is only 38 % of that of the earth and much higher than that of the Moon surface, so the probe requires higher power.
此外,由于火星的重力仅为地球的38%,而且比月球表面的重力要高得多,所以探测器需要更高的能量。
of addition, since the gravity of the Mars is only 38 % of that of the earth and much higher than that of the Moon surface, so the probe requires higher power.

In to, since the gravity of the Mars is only 38 % of that of the earth and much higher than that of the Moon surface, so the probe requires higher power.
至此,由于火星的重力仅为地球的38%,而且比月球表面的重力要高得多,所以探测器需要更高的能量。
" The core and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "
火星探险任务的核心和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会可以保证成功。
" The heart and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "
火星探索任务的心脏和最困难的部分是探测器进入火星大气层后的气动形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会来确保成功。
" The key and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "

" The future and the most difficult part of the Mars exploration mission are the aerodynamic shape and parachute deceleration process after the probe enters Martian atmosphere. There is just one chance to ensure success. "
在探测器进入火星大气层后,火星探测任务的未来和最困难的部分是气动力形状和降落伞减速过程,只有一次机会来确保成功。
According to Sun Ze, it must rely on the detector to complete the entire process because the distance between the Earth and the Mars is quite large.

对太阳 Ze,它必须依靠探测器来完成整个过程,因为地球和火星之间的距离相当大。
Because there is not so much propellant to offset the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
因为没有太多的推进剂来抵消高速,所以减速应该依靠火星的大气层来着陆火星,然而,要模拟地球上的火星的大气层是相当困难的。
Because there is not so much propellant to offset the low speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
因为没有太多的推进剂来抵消低速,所以减速应该依靠火星的大气层来着陆火星,然而,模拟地球上的火星的大气层是相当困难的。
Because there is not so much propellant to absorb the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.
由于没有太多的推进剂来吸收高速,减速应该依靠火星的大气层来着陆火星,然而,要模拟地球上的火星的大气层是相当困难的。
Because there is not so much propellant to sustain the high speed, the slowdown should rely on the atmosphere of the Mars while landing the Mars. However, it is quite difficult to simulate the atmosphere of the Mars on earth.

Pang Zhihao said, in general, the way to detect the Mars is similar to the way to detect the moon. The entire process is also " surrounding, landing, patrolling and returning " to achieve the goal of manned landing on the Mars.
庞志豪说,一般而言,探测火星的方式与探测月球的方式相似,整个过程也是“环绕、着陆、巡逻和返回”,以达到在火星上载人着陆的目标。

Pang Zhihao said, in general, the way to find the Mars is similar to the way to detect the moon. The entire process is also " surrounding, landing, patrolling and returning " to achieve the goal of manned landing on the Mars.
