Because the distance between the Mars and the earth is larger than that between the Moon and Earth, it needs to overcome a series of more complex technical difficulties before the Mars detection.
由于火星与地球之间的距离大于月球与地球之间的距离,因此在火星探测之前需要克服一系列更为复杂的技术困难。

in Quan stressed that if the political party, accompanying organization or trustees are in violations of the regulations which prohibit provisions ban, the Commission will investigate and punish " according to the law ".
胡锦涛强调,如果政党、随行组织或受托人违反禁止条款的规定,委员会将依法进行调查和处罚。
Lin Quan also announced that Hong Peigen, " Deputy Director of the Independent ", will serve as the vice chairman of the Ill-gotten Party Assets Settlement Committee.
林泉还宣布,“独立党副主任”洪培根将担任“党资产结算委员会”副主席。
and Quan also announced that Hong Peigen, " Deputy Director of the Independent ", will serve as the vice chairman of the Ill-gotten Party Assets Settlement Committee.

He said that Gu Lixiong will be the most appropriate candidate for the Ill-gotten Party Assets Handling Regulations. The experience of Hong Peigen who dealt with the major cases will serve as the foundation for the committee to uncover the related Ill-gotten Party Assets.
他说,郭立雄是《党资产处理规例》中最合适的人选。洪培根处理重大案件的经验,将成为委员会揭发有关党资产的基础。

Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets today, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要今天有党的财产,就不会有人给你社会捐款,所以如果全被没收,国民党就可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产,你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets now, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要现在有党的财产,就不会有人给你社会捐款,所以如果党被全部没收,国民党就可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产,你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets here, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要这里有党的财产,就不会有人给你社会捐款,所以如果全被没收,国民党就可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产,你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets everyday, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要每天有党的财产,就不会有人给你社会捐款,所以如果全被没收,国民党可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产,你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets present, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要有党的财产存在,就不会有人给你社会捐赠,所以如果该党全部被没收,国民党可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产的时候你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian said that, as long as there are party assets Today, no one will give you social donations. So if the party were all confiscated away, then Kuomintang can just ask for social support and sponsorship, " You will have chance to go when there are no assets. "
詹齐县说,只要今天有党的财产,就不会有人给你社会捐款,所以如果全被没收了,国民党可以要求社会支持和赞助,“没有财产,你就有机会去。”
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-gotten Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的所得资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺没收,该党资产将变为无效,当事方将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-received Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《来信方资产处理条例》生效,国民党资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按承诺没收,该党资产将变为无效,当事方将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-obtained Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的不良资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺没收,该党的资产将变为无效,该党将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-Done Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的自认资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺没收,该党的资产将变为无效,该党将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-taken Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的收购资产处理条例》生效,国民党的资产也未被完全没收,其余资产将继续按照承诺没收,该党的资产将无效,该党将自始至终。
Zhan Qixian also stressed that even if the Ill-got Party Assets Handling Regulations goes into effect and the Kuomintang party assets are not fully confiscated, the rest will continue to be confiscated as promised, the party asset will go null and the party will start from scratch.
詹齐相还强调,即使《党的财产处理条例》生效,国民党的财产尚未全部没收,其余财产将继续按照承诺没收,该党财产将变为无效,当事方将自始至终。

The legal evening news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor doctor " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法定晚间新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了对微博“走廊医生”活动的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微型梦庄科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。
The legal afternoon news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor doctor " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法定午后新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了对微博“走廊医生”活动的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微型梦庄科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。
The legal morning news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor doctor " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法定的早晨新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了他针对微博“走廊医生”事件的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微型梦庄科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。

The Legal evening news : Because the CCTV host Wang Zhi'an published his remarks against the " corridor doctor " event on microblogging, Lan Yuefeng brought Wang Zhi'an and Beijing Micro Dream Chuangke Network Technology Co., Ltd. to the court.
法律晚间新闻:由于央视主持人王智安发表了他针对微博“走廊医生”事件的讲话,兰岳峰将王智安和北京微型梦庄科网络科技有限公司带入法庭。
Yesterday afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日下午,海淀法院对案件作出判决,裁定王志安和微梦公司不构成侵权,并驳回兰岳峰的所有索赔。
Yesterday evening, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日傍晚,海淀法庭宣判该案件,裁定王志安和微梦公司不构成侵权,并驳回兰岳峰的所有索赔。
Yesterday end, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
昨日结束,海淀法庭宣判该案件,裁定王志安和微梦公司不构成侵权,并驳回兰岳峰的所有索赔。
and afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
和下午,海淀法庭宣判了案件,判决称王志安和微梦公司不构成侵权,并驳回了兰岳峰的所有索赔要求。
to afternoon, Haidian court sentenced the case and the verdict said that Wang Zhi'an and Micro Dream Company did not constitute the infringement and dismissed the Lan Yuefeng for all the claims.
直至下午,海淀法院才宣判该案件,判决称,王志安和微梦公司并未构成侵权,因此驳回了兰岳峰的所有索赔要求。

At the beginning of 2014, CCTV reporter Wang Zhi'an found after his survey that although Lan Yuefeng was sitting in the corridor for more than 600 days and was shaped as the tragic hero suppressed by the media, these reports had a lot of false information.
2014年初,央视记者王志安在接受调查后发现,尽管兰岳峰在走廊坐了600多天,被媒体视为被媒体压抑的悲剧英雄,但这些报道却含有大量虚假信息。

At the time of the trial, the two sides argued whether Wang Zhian violated the reputation right of Lan Yuefeng.

According to statistics, among all iPhone users, about 26 % of users have not changed their phones for 2 years. That is, almost 120 million users of iPhones have been using the same iPhone for 2 years.
据统计,在所有iPhone用户中,约有26%的用户已经有两年没有更换手机了,也就是说,近1.2亿iPhone用户用了两年来一直使用相同的iPhone。
According to data, among all iPhone users, about 26 % of users have not changed their phones for 2 years. That is, almost 120 million users of iPhones have been using the same iPhone for 2 years.

Yesterday, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
昨天,华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行发布了2016年的半年期报告,第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司将再次收购其股票。
to, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
华夏银行(Huaxia Bank)和上海浦东发展银行(Shanghai Pudong Development Bank)发布了2016年半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(China Securities Finance Corporation,CSFC)将再次收购其股票。
the, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
华夏银行(Huaxia Bank)和上海浦东发展银行(Shanghai Pudong Development Bank)发布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(China Securities Finance Corporation,CSFC)将再次收购其股票。
of, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行发布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(中信集团)将再次收购其股票。
in, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
华夏银行和上海浦东发展银行发布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(中信集团)将再次收购其股票。
and, Huaxia Bank and Shanghai Pudong Development Bank issued a semi-annual report of the year 2016. In the second quarter, China Securities Finance Corporation Limited ( CSFC ) will once again buy their shares.
华夏银行(Huaxia Bank)和上海浦东发展银行(Shanghai Pudong Development Bank)发布了2016年的半年期报告。第二季度,中国证券金融有限公司(China Securities Finance Corporation,CSFC)将再次收购其股票。
Among them, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
其中,华夏银行将再持有29.293亿股,到6月底,华夏银行将增加其华夏银行股份至3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
Among it, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
华夏银行将在其中再持有29.293亿股股份,到6月底,华夏银行将增持3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
Among the, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
在华夏银行股份中,华夏银行将再持有29.293亿股,到6月底,华夏银行股份将增加至3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
Among of, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
其中,华夏银行将再持有29.293亿股,到6月底,华夏银行将增加其华夏银行股份至3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
Among to, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
华夏银行将另外持有29.293亿股,到6月底,华夏银行将增加其华夏银行股份至3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
Among in, CSFC will hold an additional 29. 2931 million shares of Huaxia Bank. By the end of June, CSFC will increase its shares of Huaxia Bank to 387 million shares, raising its shares of Huaxia Bank from 3. 35 % to 3. 62 %.
华夏银行将增持29.2931亿股,到6月底,华夏银行将增持3.87亿股,华夏银行股份由3.35%升至3.62%。
According to the estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the shares, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.
根据从股票中扣除的招商证券(China Merchant Securities)的估计,中投第二季度将再持有浦东发展银行(Pudong Development Bank)的3800万股股份,并将该股上市至近6亿股,占该行股票的2.77%。
According to a estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the shares, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.
根据从股票中扣除的招商证券(China Merchant Securities)的估计,中投第二季度将再持有浦东发展银行(Pudong Development Bank)的3800万股股份,并将该股上市至近6亿股,占该行股票的2.77%。
According to of estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the shares, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.
根据从股票中扣除的招商证券(China Merchant Securities)的估算,中投第二季度将再持有浦东发展银行3800万股股份,其股票将升至近6亿股,占该银行股票的2.77%。
According to the estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the share, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.
根据从该股票中扣除的招商证券(China Merchant Securities)的估计,中投第二季度将再持有浦东发展银行3800万股股份,并将股票上调到近6亿股,占该银行股票的2.77%。
According to the estimates of China Merchants Securities, deducted from the shareholders, CSFC will hold another 38 million shares of Pudong Development Bank in the second quarter and raise its shares to almost 600 million shares, which account for 2. 77 % of the bank shares.

近日,浙江省桐乡市正福村石子邦河博公园正式向村民和游客开放。

Composed of more than 100 circular small ponds, the park is planted with more than 300 varieties of ornamental lotus, water lilies and so on.
公园由100多个圆形小池塘组成,种植了300多个不同的观赏莲花、水莲花等。

Rural lotus industry is both ornamental and amusing, with economic benefits and has become the highlights for the development of new villages.
农村莲花业既具有观赏性,又具有娱乐性,具有经济效益,已成为新农村发展的亮点。

According to foreign media reports, the " green pool " incident of Rio Olympic Games gained much attention because its diving pool water was changed from blue to green.
据外国媒体报道,里约奥运会的“绿池”事件引起了人们的关注,因为其潜水池的水由蓝色水变为绿色水。

Previously, Rio officials confirmed the situation of water greening, and said the water color is due to the weakening of alkaline reasons and will not affect the athlete's health.
之前,力拓的官员证实了绿化水的情况,并说水的颜色是由于碱性原因的削弱,不会影响运动员的健康。

During the competition period of the Australia and Japanese team, the environmental conditions of the water polo pond gradually worsened, but the official stressed that they would manage to return the water quality of the two pools to their original colors on the 11th day of the month.
在澳大利亚队和日本队的比赛期间,水球池的环境条件逐渐恶化,但该官员强调,他们将设法在每月第11天恢复这两个池子的水质。

" This independent team confirms our assessment and confirms the measures we have taken to restore the normal color and normal chemical status of the pool. "

这个调查小组证实了我们的评估,并证实了我们为恢复水池的正常颜色和化学状态所采取的措施。
" This environmental team confirms our assessment and confirms the measures we have taken to restore the normal color and normal chemical status of the pool. "
这个环境小组证实了我们的评估,并证实了我们为恢复池子的正常颜色和化学状态所采取的措施。
According to Taiwan's " The Central News Agency ", one jail in the suburb of the Manila area saw a bombing event, resulting in the death of 10 prisoners, including two Chinese, and the injury of the warden.

Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
乌鲁木齐使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
U Nanqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
U Nanqi使旅游市场的经营秩序正常化,并规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market and regulates that tourism agencies must sign contracts with tourists

Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market in regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
乌鲁木齐规范了旅游市场的经营秩序,规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market a regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
乌鲁木齐规范了旅游市场的经营秩序,规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
Urumqi normalizes the operating order of travel tourism market of regulates that travel agencies must sign contracts with tourists
乌鲁木齐规范旅游市场经营秩序,规定旅行社必须与游客签订合同
Currently, Xinjiang has entered peak tourist season. In order to regulate the management order of tourism FIT market, yesterday Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment worked with the law enforcement detachment of Urumqi Transportation Authority to investigate and deal with the non-normative travel vehicles existent in the tourism FIT market, and the low contract signing between the travel agency and tourists.
目前,新疆已进入旅游旺季,为了规范旅游FIT市场的管理秩序,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队昨日与乌鲁木齐运输局执法分遣队合作,调查并处理旅游FIT市场存在的非规范旅行车辆,以及旅行社与旅游者之间签定的合同少的问题。
Currently, Xinjiang has entered peak tourism season. " A fine of 30, 000 to 100, 000 yuan will be imposed for operation beyond scope. The driver who did not have a qualification certificate will pay RMB 2, 000 for fine. "
经营范围外的,处三万元以上十万元以下的罚款,无资质证书的,由司机处以二千元以下的罚款。

It be reported that the Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Department has investigated the places including West Park and Hongshan where the independent travelers are centralized.
据报道,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法部门对包括西公园和红山在内的独立旅客集中的地方进行了调查。
It are reported that the Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Department has investigated the places including West Park and Hongshan where the independent travelers are centralized.
据报道,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法部门对包括西公园和红山在内的独立旅客集中的地方进行了调查。
to is reported that the Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Department has investigated the places including West Park and Hongshan where the independent travelers are centralized.
据报道,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法部门已对包括西公园和红山在内的独立旅客集中的地方进行了调查。
the is reported that the Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Department has investigated the places including West Park and Hongshan where the independent travelers are centralized.
据报道,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法部门对包括西公园和红山在内的独立旅客集中的地方进行了调查。
After integrating the inspection twice, Ma Qi, the deputy head of Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment said that, " Safety first, norm second. No small matters for the travel vehicles. And people will be injured and killed in groups in case of any questions. "
乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队副队长马齐两次整合检查后表示,“安全第一,规范第二,对旅行车辆而言,没有什么小事。如果发生任何问题,都会有人受伤或被集体杀害。”
After incorporating the inspection twice, Ma Qi, the deputy head of Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment said that, " Safety first, norm second. No small matters for the travel vehicles. And people will be injured and killed in groups in case of any questions. "
乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队副队长马齐两次进行检查后表示,“安全第一,规范第二,对于旅行车辆来说,没有什么小事。如果发生任何问题,都会有人被集体伤害和杀死。”
After implementing the inspection twice, Ma Qi, the deputy head of Urumqi City Tourism Law Enforcement Detachment said that, " Safety first, norm second. No small matters for the travel vehicles. And people will be injured and killed in groups in case of any questions. "
执行两次检查后,乌鲁木齐市旅游执法分遣队副队长马齐表示,“安全第一,规范第二,对旅行车辆而言,没有什么小事。如果发生任何问题,都会有人被集体伤害和杀死。”

" The management and we have made continuous inspection on the market to normalize the car use behavior of tourist agency to ensure the safety of tourists. "
管理层和我们不断对市场进行检查,以使旅游代理商的汽车使用行为规范化,确保游客的安全。
" The management and we have made continuous inspection on the market to normalize the car use behaviour of tourist agency to ensure the safety of tourists. "

" The management and we have made continuous inspection on the market to normalize the car use activity of tourist agency to ensure the safety of tourists. "

管理层和我们不断对市场进行检查,以规范旅游代理商的汽车使用行为,确保旅游者的安全。
" The management and we have made continuous inspection on the market to normalize the car use behavior of tourists agency to ensure the safety of tourists. "

On the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.
8月12日上午,国务院新闻办公室举行国民经济运行新闻发布会。
the the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.

and the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.

in the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.
国务院新闻办公室于8月12日上午于2016年7月举行了国民经济运行新闻发布会。
to the morning of August 12, the State Council Information Office held a press conference on the operation of the national economy in July 2016.
至8月12日上午,国务院新闻办公室于2016年7月举行了国民经济运行新闻发布会。
Sheng Yunyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in July, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the reasonable range.
国家统计局发言人、国家经济统计司司长沈云云表示,7月份国民经济的部分指数相对放缓,但仍在合理范围内运行。
Sheng Yuyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in July, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the reasonable range.

Sheng Qiyun, spokesman of National Bureau of Statistics and head of National Economic Statistics Division said that, in July, the part index number of national economy slowed relatively but still operated in the reasonable range.

According to the data of National Bureau of Statistics, the fixed asset investment growth, total imports and other data in July have come down.
根据国家统计局的数据,7月份固定资产投资增长、进口总额和其他数据已经下降。

Sheng Laiyun said, as for the national economy in July, I would like to use the words of Premier, " the shape is volatile and the potential is still good ". This is a better way to summarize the characteristics of the economic operation in July.
盛莱云说,至于七月的国民经济,我想用总理的话来说,“形势是动荡的,潜力还是好的”,这是总结七月经济运行特点的较好方法。

He explained that " the shape of the fluctuations " refers to the fall after rise of some economic indicators growth rate in July.

In July, the domestic and international economy is still in the deep adjustment, the international situation is complex and volatile and the world economic recovery is less than expected, so the export pressure is still relatively heavy.
7月,国内、国际经济仍处于深度调整阶段,国际形势复杂多变,世界经济复苏低于预期,出口压力仍相对沉重。

As for the domestic situation, the whole economy is still in the critical stage of adjustment, adjustment labor pains are releasing and the economy is under great pressure, so some indicators are still fluctuating.
至于国内形势,整个经济仍处在调整的临界阶段,调整劳动力的痛苦正在减轻,经济正面临巨大的压力,因此一些指标仍在波动。

He said, " The potential is still good " means that despite the fallback of economic growth, the overall economic performance is stable and steady. And the good momentum has not changed.

In July, CPI rose by 1. 8 %, with a month-on-month rise of 0. 2 %. From January to July, CPI rose by 2. 1 %, so the overall price situation is stable.
7月CPI上涨1.8%,每月上涨0.2%,1月至7月,CPI上涨2.1%,物价总体稳定。
In Jul, CPI rose by 1. 8 %, with a month-on-month rise of 0. 2 %. From January to July, CPI rose by 2. 1 %, so the overall price situation is stable.

According to the statistics of hot weather in the districts and counties by the portal of the Chongqing Municipal Bureau of Meteorology, in addition to Youyang, the rest of the city can receive different degrees of high temperature allowance.
根据重庆市气象局门户网站对各区、县的热天气统计,除优阳外,城市其它地区还可以享受不同程度的高温降温。

At present, at least 28 provinces in the country have clearly defined the standard of the allowance, but the standards issued by provinces and municipalities are not the same, and people in Chongqing receive the allowance based on the count of high-temperature working days.
目前,全国至少有28个省明确规定了补贴标准,但省市发放的标准不同,重庆人民根据高温工作日数领取补贴。

In case of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
温度在35°C至37°C之间时,每人每天可享受不低于10元的零用钱。温度高于[UNK]时,每人可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In event of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
遇有35至37°[香港]的温度,人们可获得不低于10元的每日津贴。若温度高于[香港],人们可获得不低于15元的津贴。
In total of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
气温在35～37°[香港]之间,每人每天可享受不少于10元的零用钱。如果气温超过[香港],每人可享受不低于15元的零用钱。

在35至37°[香港]的温度条件下,人们每天可享受不低于10元的零用钱。如果温度高于[香港],人们可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In average of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
平均气温在35至37[香港]之间,人们每天可享受不低于10元的零用钱。如果气温高于[香港],人们可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In the of temperature between 35 and 37 [UNK], people can receive allowance of no less than 10 yuan per day. In case of temperature above [UNK], people are released with the allowance of not less than 15 yuan.
在[香港]35-37°C的温度下,人们每天可享受不少于10元的零用钱。如果温度高于[香港],人们可享受不低于15元的零用钱。
In case of temperature above [UNK], staff working in high temperature can receive up to 20 yuan per day of allowance ( but for laborers who enjoy the high temperature job allowance ).
如果温度高于[香港],高温工作者每天可获得最高20元的补贴(但享受高温工作补贴的劳动者除外)。

In accordance with this standard, people in Kaizhou which has the highest number of high temperature can receive 330 yuan. And people in Chengkou with the least days of high temperature can receive 80 yuan. And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.
按照这一标准,高温最高的国家的开州人民可以获得330元人民币,高温最低的成口人民可以获得80元人民币,而优阳最高气温不符合高温标准,因此没有高温允许值。
In accordance to this standard, people in Kaizhou which has the highest number of high temperature can receive 330 yuan. And people in Chengkou with the least days of high temperature can receive 80 yuan. And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.

And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.

And the maximum temperature of Youyang did not meet the high temperature standards, so there is no high temperature allowance.
按照这一标准,高温最高的国家的威州人民可以获得330元人民币,而高温最低的国家人民币可获得80元人民币,而优阳最高气温不符合高温标准,因此没有高温允许值。
In the past, many companies adopt cool drinks as high temperature allowance. The city safety supervision bureau deemed that this behavior does not meet the current regulation.
过去,很多公司都采用冷饮作为高温允许。城市安全监督局认为,这种做法不符合现行规定。

Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and reducing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣减或减少工人工资,以免终止工作和缩短工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and decreasing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得因停止工作和减少工作时间而扣减或减少工人的工资。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and cutting working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得因停止工作和缩短工作时间而扣减或减少工人的工资。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and increasing working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得扣除或减少工人的工资,以免终止工作和增加工作时间。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and limiting working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得因终止工作和限制工作时间而扣减或减少工人的工资。
Employer shall not deduct or reduce the wages of workers in case of terminating work and extending working hours in high temperature weather.
在高温天气中,雇主不得在终止工作和延长工作时间的情况下扣减或减少工人的工资。
The city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
北京市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温工作期间没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
The City's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
纽约市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温下工作时没有享受高温补贴,他们可通过劳资纠纷调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或致电12333投诉。
The city's Social Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
市社会资源安全局表示,如果员工在高温下工作时没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333进行投诉。
The city's Employment Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
市的就业资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温下工作时没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
The city's Labor Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
北京市劳动资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温环境下工作,不享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
the city's Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that if employees did not receive high temperature allowance while working under high temperature, they may fight for the legitimate rights and interests via the labor dispute mediation organization or dial 12333 for complaint.
北京市人力资源和社会保障局表示,如果员工在高温下工作时没有享受高温补贴,可以通过劳动争议调解机构为合法权益而斗争,或者致电12333投诉。
If the employing unit refuses to pay the high temperature allowance, the laborer may lodge a complaint with the competent department of human resources social security at the county level or above.
用人单位拒绝支付高温补贴的,可以向县级以上人力资源社会保障主管部门提出申诉。

对用人单位拒付高温补贴的,劳动者可以向县级以上人力资源社会保障主管部门提出申诉。

At the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,而不是福利,所以这种津贴应列入工资总额,并扣除税款。
in the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,不是福利,所以该津贴应计入工资总额,并扣除税款。
to the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,不是福利的,所以该津贴应计入工资总额,并扣除税款。
of the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.

the the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,不是福利,所以这种津贴应列入工资总额,并扣除税款。
and the same time, because the high temperature allowance is part of the wage and not welfare, such allowance shall be included in the total wages, with tax deducted.
同时,由于高温津贴是工资的一部分,不是福利,所以该津贴应计入工资总额,并扣除税款。
So the high temperature allowance is not within the minimum wage, it must be issued in cash and not substituted by physical objects such as drinks.
因此,高温津贴不低于最低工资标准,必须用现金发放,不得用饮料等实物取而代之。
So the high temperature allowance is not within the minimum wage, it must be issued in money and not substituted by physical objects such as drinks.
因此,高温津贴不低于最低工资标准,必须用货币发放,不得被饮料等实物替代。

This caucan, which had its beak broken and was dying just one year and a half ago, finally regained its new life.
这棵山山,它的喙断裂了,一年半前就快要死了,终于恢复了新生活。
This soucan, which had its beak broken and was dying just one year and a half ago, finally regained its new life.
这个苏干嘴断了,一年半前就快要死了,它终于恢复了新生活。
This day not only announced that it has restored health by 100 %, but also signaled its moving into the luxury aviary to meet its human friends.
这一天,它不仅宣布已经100%恢复了健康,而且还预示着它正步入奢侈品市场,与人类朋友见面。
This night not only announced that it has restored health by 100 %, but also signaled its moving into the luxury aviary to meet its human friends.

This morning not only announced that it has restored health by 100 %, but also signaled its moving into the luxury aviary to meet its human friends.

The beak is a thin layer of horny sheath, which is hollow inside and only has some of the thin bone to support.
喙是角质鞘的薄层,内部是空的,只有一些薄骨支撑。

Animal rescue center, ornithologist and a US 3D printing company worked together to prepare several " test beak " for Gracia and finally built a " perfect beak " for it.
动物救援中心、鸟类学家和美国三维打印公司共同为Gracia准备了数个“测试喙”,最终为它制造了一个“完美喙”。

" The situation of Gracia is very special, and its remaining part of the beak is less than 1 centimeter, so there are many difficulties in installing the new beak. "

" We first scanned Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我们先扫描了格拉西亚,然后设计并生产了一个延伸假体,比其喙的其余部分稍长一点,并用胶固在喙上。
" I first scanned Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我首先扫描了Gracia,然后设计并生产了一个延伸的假体,比其喙的其余部分稍长一点,并用胶固在喙上。
" We first screened Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我们首先筛选格拉西亚,然后设计和生产一个延伸假体比其喙的其余部分稍长,并用胶固在喙上。
" We first searched Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我们首先搜索格拉西亚,然后设计并生产出一个延伸假体比其喙的其余部分稍长,并用胶固在喙上。
" We first examined Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "

" We first checked Gracia and then designed and produced an extended prosthesis slightly longer than the rest of its beak and fixed on its beak with glue. "
我们首先检查了格拉西亚,然后设计并生产了一个延伸假体,比其喙的其余部分稍长一点,并用胶固在喙上。
" This can reduce the risk of further intrusive damage to Gracia, " Lange told Xinhua International.
兰格对新华社国际表示, “ 这可以降低格拉西亚遭受进一步侵扰性损害的风险. ”

" There can reduce the risk of further intrusive damage to Gracia, " Lange told Xinhua International.
兰格对新华社国际表示,“这可以降低格拉西亚遭受进一步侵扰性损害的风险。”
" We can reduce the risk of further intrusive damage to Gracia, " Lange told Xinhua International.
兰格对新华社表示,“我们可以减少对格拉西亚的进一步侵扰性损害的风险。”
Before installing the prosthesis, the staff cleared the broken beak of Gracia every day to prevent infection.
在安装假体之前,工作人员每天清扫格拉西亚断裂的嘴,以防止感染。

to to JX Energy, " After the end of 2015, China began to export high-quality light oil to Australia. " Such light oil products are competitive with Japanese products on the Asian market.

Although the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable areas while being concerned about the market ".
尽管“日本高品质石油”陷入危机,日本石油公司刚刚采取了“出口至有利可图的地区,同时关注市场”的战略。
the the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable areas while being concerned about the market ".
日本的“优质石油”陷入了危机,日本的石油公司刚刚采取了“出口至有利可图的地区,同时关注市场”的战略。
and the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable areas while being concerned about the market ".
而“日产高质油”陷入了危机,日本石油公司刚刚采取了“向有利可图的地区出口的同时关注市场”的策略。
of the " Japanese high quality oil " falls into a crisis, the Japanese oil companies just adopted the strategy of " exporting to profitable areas while being concerned about the market ".

The scope of the fund covers college entrance freshmen, excluding tuition-free majors. Students qualified for the fund should have excellent study performance and family poverty.
基金范围涵盖高校新生入学,但不包括免缴学费的专业。符合基金条件的学生应具有优秀的学习成绩及家庭贫困。

According to the statistics bureau, the population growth of New Zealand had previously exceeded 2 % in 1974 and during the 1950s-1960s ( " baby boom " ).
据国家统计局统计,新西兰的人口增长率在1974年和1950年代-1960年代("婴儿潮")曾超过2%。

As of June this year, New Zealand's net inflow of immigrants within 12 months was 69, 100, making it the main driver of New Zealand's population growth in recent years.
截至今年6月,新西兰在12个月内移民净流入量为69 100人,使其成为新西兰近年来人口增长的主要驱动力。
As of July this year, New Zealand's net inflow of immigrants within 12 months was 69, 100, making it the main driver of New Zealand's population growth in recent years.

Data shows that in the last 10 years, the average annual net inflow of immigrants in New Zealand is 21, 800, with natural population growth of 32, 300 people.
数据显示,在过去十年中,新西兰平均每年移民净流入人数为21 800人,自然人口增长32 300人。
Data indicates that in the last 10 years, the average annual net inflow of immigrants in New Zealand is 21, 800, with natural population growth of 32, 300 people.

From the population structure point of view, a large influx of immigrants means that the ratio of " working age population " aged 15 to 39 years old gradually expanded.
从人口结构的角度来看,大量移民涌入意味着年龄在15岁至39岁之间的"工作年龄人口"的比例逐渐扩大。

in 10 o'clock yesterday morning, X9003 international cargo flights were leaving the Xi'an Xinzhu railway station and bound for Kazakhstan's Almaty.
昨天上午10点,X9003国际货运航班离开西安新竹火车站,前往哈萨克斯坦阿拉木图。
The successful launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
这次火车的成功开通标志着,自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了1万辆马车。
The successfully launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
这次火车的成功开通标志着自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了1万辆马车。
The total launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
这次火车总开动标志着自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了10000辆列车。
The completed launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
这次火车的开通标志着自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了10000辆列车。
The debut launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
该列火车首次开通,标志着自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了1万辆马车。
The launch launch of this train marked that Xi'an Railway Bureau has successfully launched 10, 000 carriages since the start of Sino-Asia international cargo flights.
这次火车的开航标志着,自中亚国际货运航班启动以来,西安铁路局已成功开通了1万辆马车。
It is understood that the goods category of this freight train cover six major categories, namely industrial raw materials, machinery and equipment, industrial spare parts, building materials, food, light industrial products, and 206 varieties in total.
据了解,这列货运列车的货品类别包括六大类,即工业原材料、机械设备、工业零件、建筑材料、食品、轻工业产品和总共206种品种。

As of August 11 this year, the Xinzhu station opened a total of 221 freight trains and 10, 009 vehicles. A total of 338, 000 tons of goods have been transported. Among them, 84 freight trains began operation in 2016, a year-on-year increase of 47 %.
截至今年8月11日,新竹站共开通货运列车221次,车辆10 009辆,运输货物338 000吨,其中货运列车84次于2016年开始运营,较上年同期增长47%。
As on August 11 this year, the Xinzhu station opened a total of 221 freight trains and 10, 009 vehicles. A total of 338, 000 tons of goods have been transported. Among them, 84 freight trains began operation in 2016, a year-on-year increase of 47 %.

As of the end of July, the volume of container received for Sino-Asia freight trains reached 64, 000 TEU, an increase of 8 % over the same period in 2015.

With the increase of the operation of Sino-Asia freight trains, the freight volume of the Xinzhu Railway Station of Xi'an Railway Bureau increased year by year.
随着中亚货运列车运营量的增长,西安铁路局新竹铁路站的货运量逐年增加。
With the increase of the operation of Sino-Asia freight trains, the freight volume of the Xinzhu Railway Station under Xi'an Railway Bureau increased year by year.
随着中亚货运列车运营量的增长,西安铁路局西竹站的货运量逐年增加。

With the increase of in operation of Sino-Asia freight trains, the freight volume of the Xinzhu Railway Station of Xi'an Railway Bureau increased year by year.
随着中亚货运列车运营量的增长,西安铁路局新竹铁路站的货运量逐年增加。
With the increase of and operation of Sino-Asia freight trains, the freight volume of the Xinzhu Railway Station of Xi'an Railway Bureau increased year by year.
随着中亚铁路客运列车数量的增加和运营,西安铁路局新竹火车站的客运量逐年增加。
In 2015, the cargo throughput of the Xinzhu Railway Station of the whole year reached 2. 477 million tons. As of August 10, 2016, the volume of cargo has reached 1. 531 million tons, representing an increase of 6. 7 % over the same period last year.
到2015年,新竹火车站全年货运量达到247.7万吨,到2016年8月10日,货运量达到15.31万吨,比上年同期增长6.7%。
In 2015, the cargo throughput at the Xinzhu Railway Station of the whole year reached 2. 477 million tons. As of August 10, 2016, the volume of cargo has reached 1. 531 million tons, representing an increase of 6. 7 % over the same period last year.
到2015年,新竹火车站全年货物吞吐量达到247.7万吨,到2016年8月10日,货物总量达到15.31万吨,比上年同期增长6.7%。

of 2015, the cargo throughput of the Xinzhu Railway Station of the whole year reached 2. 477 million tons. As of August 10, 2016, the volume of cargo has reached 1. 531 million tons, representing an increase of 6. 7 % over the same period last year.
截至二零零五年五月十日,新竹火车站全年货物吞吐量达247.7亿吨。截至二零零六年八月十日,货物吞吐量达15.31亿吨,较去年同期增长6.7%。
In order to meet the needs of future development, the Construction Planning of Xi'an New Integrated Logistics Center has been introduced, with Xi'an Xinzhu railway station as a focus, endeavoring to build a modern new railway integrated logistics park.
为了满足今后发展的需要,西安新建综合物流中心建设规划工作已经启动,西安新竹铁路站成为重点,致力于建设现代化的铁路综合物流园区。

A mid-aged man in India last week experienced airplane belly landing shock at Dubai International Airport. He won US $ 1 million award in the same airport last week.
上周,印度一名中年男子在迪拜国际机场遭受了飞机腹部降落的冲击,上周他在同一机场赢得了100万美元的奖金。

Although now it is the beginning of autumn, the power of " afterheat " seems not to be weaker at all than that in the summer.
虽然现在是秋天的开始,但“过热”的力量似乎并不比夏天弱。

Sunblock is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
Sundlock通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,以UVB为对象。一般SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
Sun foil is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
太阳箔通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,针对紫外线。一般SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
Sun Block is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
太阳块通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,针对紫外线。一般SPF指数包括15,30,50等。
Sun filter is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
太阳滤波器通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,以紫外线为对象。一般SPF指数包括15、30、50等。
Sun block is generally marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
太阳块通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,针对紫外线。一般SPF指数包括15,30,50等。
Sunblock is typically marked with SPF and PA on the package. SPF refers to Sun Protection Function and is targeted at UVB. The common SPF index includes 15, 30, 50, etc.
Sundlock通常在包件上标有SPF和PA。SPF是指太阳保护功能,针对UVB。一般SPF指数包括15,30,50等。
The product marked with PA is for UVA, so that sunblock will play a more effective role. Usually, the intensity of PA is represented with +. An extra + indicates extension of effective protection time.
标有PA的产品是UVA的,因此防晒霜的作用会更加有效。通常PA的强度用+表示。额外的+表示有效保护时间的延长。

Water-based sunblock with a strong penetration is often applied to oily skin. Sunscreen spray is also a good choice.
渗透性强的水性防晒霜常适用于油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。

具有强渗透性的底部防晒霜常适用于油性皮肤,防晒剂也是很好的选择。

Creamy sunscreen is often applied to dry skin. The classification of neutral skin generally has no strict rules. Any kind of skin care products are burden to the sensitive skin. So it is recommended to choose pure physical sunscreen products.
干燥的皮肤经常使用防晒霜。中立的皮肤的分类通常没有严格的规则。任何种类的护肤品都会对敏感的皮肤造成负担。因此建议选择纯天然的防晒产品。

Remember to apply sunblock half an hour in advance, because sunscreen products take time to completely penetrate into the skin.
记住提前半小时涂上防晒霜,因为防晒霜产品需要时间才能完全穿透皮肤。

Because you are exposed to sun longer during the military training, you have to apply the sunscreen products once every two hours to lengthen the effect. So keep doing it.
由于你在军事训练中长时间暴露在太阳下,你必须每两个小时涂一次防晒产品来延长效果,所以继续这样做。

After exposure under the blazing sun for quite a long time, please wrap the ice with towel to ease the sunburned skin and alleviate the local heat if condition allowed.
长时间暴露在烈日下后,请用毛巾裹住冰块,以免晒伤皮肤,并在条件允许时减轻局部热量。

《湖南公约》已成为当地培育特色产业发展、促进特色产业“退出”的重要平台。
During some nights, the ionized layer is full of free electrons, which means that the radio signal can go further.
在某些夜晚,离子化层中充满了自由电子,这意味着无线电信号可以向前推进。

根据美国月度网站《大众科学》(Population Science)的报道,8月11日,美国空军有意复制这一效果。

Although the stable ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the edge of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.
尽管拥有大量自由电子的稳定的电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台边缘的无线电,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。
Although the neutral ionizing layer with a large number of free electrons may help people listen to the radio at the edge of a university radio station, but this may not be the interest of the US Air Force.

尽管拥有大量自由电子的相干电离层可以帮助人们收听大学广播电台边缘的收音机,但这或许不是美国空军的兴趣所在。

Ionization layer full of electrons indicated the radio used by the military has a larger range of broadcasts. In addition, it may prevent the global positioning system ( GPS ) signal from the solar storm.
充斥电子的离子化层表明,军方使用的无线电广播范围更大,此外,还可能防止全球定位系统 ( GPS ) 的信号从太阳风暴中消失。

Industry data showed that the total size of coal production in 2015 was close to 6 billion tons and the national coal production overcapacity reached 1. 8 billion tons.
工业数据显示,2015年煤炭总产量接近60亿吨,全国煤炭生产能力过剩达到18亿吨。

From last November to this January, the price of Qinhuangdao 5500 kcal steam coal lingers at 370 yuan / ton and 90 % of the coal enterprises fell into a loss.
从去年11月到今年1月,秦皇岛5500千卡蒸汽煤的价格维持在每吨370元,90%的煤炭企业出现亏损。
From this November to this January, the price of Qinhuangdao 5500 kcal steam coal lingers at 370 yuan / ton and 90 % of the coal enterprises fell into a loss.

And since February, coal prices gradually picked up, Qinhuangdao steam coal prices rose continuously for four weeks, rose to 16 months high, once climbed to 436 yuan per ton, up nearly 70 yuan per ton over the beginning.
2月份以来,煤炭价格逐步上涨,秦皇岛蒸汽煤炭价格持续上涨4周,涨至16个月高位,一度攀升至每吨436元,开始涨至每吨近70元。

标题:加拿大警方杀害了IS的支持者:近乎尾声的在城区策划的炸弹袭击
Title : Canadian police killed IS supporters : themade bomb attacks downtown preparations near the end
标题:加拿大警方杀害了IS的支持者:近乎尾声的炸弹袭击了市区的准备工作
Canadian police said at a news conference on Wednesday that the information received by the police included the " martyrdom video " sent by the young man to the US Federal Bureau of Investigation. According to the video, the young man will launch strike.
加拿大警方星期三在新闻发布会上说,警方收到的消息包括这名年轻人向美国联邦调查局(FBI)发送的“殉难录像”,根据录像,这名年轻人将发动罢工。
Canadian police stated at a news conference on Wednesday that the information received by the police included the " martyrdom video " sent by the young man to the US Federal Bureau of Investigation. According to the video, the young man will launch strike.
加拿大警方星期三在新闻发布会上表示,警方收到的消息包括这名年轻人给美国联邦调查局的“殉难录像”,根据录像,这名年轻人将发动罢工。
Canadian police confirmed at a news conference on Wednesday that the information received by the police included the " martyrdom video " sent by the young man to the US Federal Bureau of Investigation. According to the video, the young man will launch strike.
加拿大警方星期三在新闻发布会上证实,警方收到的消息包括这名年轻人给美国联邦调查局的“殉难录像”,根据录像,这名年轻人将发动罢工。

According to the navigation needs, the old Wanfu River channel takes the mode of conservation and transformation. Dredging was conducted on the local depth and curve cut-off on the local sharp bend. Then the navigation conditions can be improved.
根据航行需要,万福河老河道采用养护和变换方式,在局部深度进行疏浚,在局部弯曲处进行弯曲,从而改善航行条件。

In accordance with the " loan construction and charging for repaying loan " principle, Jining City Anping Canal Logistics Service Center will collect channel tolls according to the charge standard approved by Shandong Provincial Price Bureau.

Reporters noticed from Jining Port and Waterway Bureau that there are a total of 4 toll channels within Jining territory, including Zhushuihe Channel, Baima River Channel, Beidahang Channel and Laowanfu Channel.
记者从济宁港水利局得知,济宁境内共有4条收费通道,包括珠井河道、百马河道、北达康道和老湾福道。
These four channels are Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal tributary channels, which are upgraded and renovated in the way of social financing.
这四个渠道是北京杭州大运河支流渠道,这些渠道以社会融资方式得到更新和改造。
These three channels are Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal tributary channels, which are upgraded and renovated in the way of social financing.
这三个渠道是北京杭州大运河支流通道,通过社会融资方式进行升级改造。
These Four channels are Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal tributary channels, which are upgraded and renovated in the way of social financing.

and four channels are Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal tributary channels, which are upgraded and renovated in the way of social financing.
北京杭州大运河支流运河有四个渠道,这些渠道通过社会融资方式得到更新和改造。
of four channels are Beijing-Hangzhou Grand Canal tributary channels, which are upgraded and renovated in the way of social financing.
其中北京杭州大运河支流运河有四个渠道,通过社会融资方式进行升级改造。
Zhushuihe Channel Upgrade Renovation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.
朱水河通道升级改造工程是山东省内江河和港口基础设施建设中首个采用“政府+市场”模式的项目,占投资主体部分,而社会基金弥补了资金缺口。
Zhushuihe Channel Upgrade Supervation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.
朱水河通道升级加固工程是山东省内江河和港口基础设施建设中首个采用“政府+市场”模式的项目,占投资主体部分,而社会基金弥补了资金缺口。
Zhushuihe Channel Regrade Renovation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.
顺井河航道改造工程是山东省江、港基础设施建设中首个采用“政府+市场”模式的项目,占投资主体部分,社会基金弥补了资金缺口。
Zhushuihe Channel Prograde Renovation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.

Zhushuihe Channel Undergrade Renovation Project is the first project adopting the mode of " government + market " for the infrastructure construction of river and ports within Shandong province. The government accounts for the major part of investment while social fund supplements the funding gap.

白马河 、 洛万福河 、 贝达留河等支线采用纯市场化经营方式.

小鹏和武岩在小组里聊天,他们因是活跃的扬声器而彼此熟悉。

Xiaopeng thought that Wuyan is quite different from the one on internet. He is quite bored and does not take the initiative to express his views. His words are repeated like this, " Oh, yes, right ", or " I will check it online ".
小鹏认为吴彦和互联网上的吴彦很不一样,他很无聊,没有主动表达自己的观点,他的话是这样反复的:“噢,是的,对的”,或者“我在网上查一下”。

The 67-year-old Xue suffers from congenital scoliosis, and in recent years she has been troubled by " asthma ", so she panted and was breathless even walking on the slope.
现年67岁的雪公主患有先天性脊椎骨质疏松症,近年来,她一直被“哮喘”困扰着,气喘吁吁,甚至在斜坡上都无法呼吸。

71岁的薛女士患有先天性脊椎骨质疏松症,近年来,她一直患“哮喘”,气喘吁吁,甚至还在斜坡上行走。
The 68-year-old Xue suffers from congenital scoliosis, and in recent years she has been troubled by " asthma ", so she panted and was breathless even walking on the slope.
68岁的薛女士患有先天性脊椎骨质疏松症,近年来,她一直被“哮喘”困扰,因此喘气喘吁吁,甚至在斜坡上行走也喘不过气来。
The 65-year-old Xue suffers from congenital scoliosis, and in recent years she has been troubled by " asthma ", so she panted and was breathless even walking on the slope.
65岁的薛女士患有先天性脊椎骨质疏松症,近年来,她一直被“哮喘”困扰,因此喘气喘吁吁,甚至在斜坡上行走也喘不过气来。
Doctors told Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生告诉薛医生,要治愈慢性支气管炎几乎是不可能的,用药物可以缓解这类问题。
Doctors said Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生说,薛氏病几乎无法治愈慢性支气管炎,用药物可以缓解这类问题。
Doctors advised Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生建议薛方说,治疗慢性支气管炎几乎是不可能的,用药物可以缓解这类问题。
Doctors described Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生们说,薛氏病几乎无法治愈慢性支气管炎,用药物可以缓解这类问题。
Doctors approached Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生们向薛医生表示,要治愈慢性支气管炎几乎是不可能的,用药物可以缓解这类问题。
Doctors recommended Xue that it was almost impossible to cure chronic bronchitis and such problems may be alleviated with medication.
医生建议学学说,治疗慢性支气管炎几乎是不可能的,用药物可以缓解这类问题。

Two earthquakes with magnitude 4. 4 and 4. 5 respectively struck Tibet's Nima County. No casualties were caused temporarily.
两次4级、4级、5级地震分别击中西藏尼马县,暂时没有人员伤亡。

「我们知道,我们有理由相信,亦由港大集团牵头的跨洋大运河工程,将为尼加拉瓜大部分民众带来更多利益,并为本地社会创造更多就业机会。」
In order to ensure the long-term effect of afforestation, HKND Group also produced an afforestation training album, distributed to all 15, 000 primary and secondary school students in the province and aimed to provide long-term technical guidance for teachers and students.
为确保植树造林的长期成效,香港自然护理署亦印制了「植树造林培训专辑」,分发给全省15000名中小学生,旨在为师生提供长远的技术指引。
In a to ensure the long-term effect of afforestation, HKND Group also produced an afforestation training album, distributed to all 15, 000 primary and secondary school students in the province and aimed to provide long-term technical guidance for teachers and students.
为确保植树造林的长期成效,香港自然护理署亦印制了「植树造林培训专辑」,分发给全省15000名中小学生,旨在为师生提供长远的技术指引。
In the to ensure the long-term effect of afforestation, HKND Group also produced an afforestation training album, distributed to all 15, 000 primary and secondary school students in the province and aimed to provide long-term technical guidance for teachers and students.

Recently, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, hosted by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai province.
不久前,由中国文艺界联合会和青海省政府主办的第10届中国国际民间艺术节在青海省西宁开幕。
in, the 10th China International Folk Art Festival, hosted by the China Federation of Literary and Art Circles and the Qinghai Provincial Government, kicked off in Xining, Qinghai province.

由中国文艺界联合会和青海省政府主办的第10届中国国际民间艺术节在青海省西宁开幕。
Some 300 artists from the art troupe of 13 countries and regions from five continents gathered together and brought a wonderful performance with quite international and national folk characteristics for audiences.
来自五大洲13个国家和地区艺术团的约300名艺术家聚集一堂,为观众带来了具有相当国际和本国特色的精彩表演。

On the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
本月第11天,塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息说,今年头7个月塔吉克斯坦的通胀率为3.
On the 11th day of the month, The Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
本月第11天,塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息说,今年头7个月塔吉克斯坦的通胀率为3.
the the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息,在当月第11日表示,塔吉克斯坦今年前7个月的通胀率为3.
in the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息说,塔吉克斯坦今年头7个月的通胀率为3.
of the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
塔吉克斯坦“阿韦斯塔”新闻社援引中央银行的消息说,塔吉克斯坦今年头7个月的通胀率为3.
to the 11th day of the month, the Tajikistan " Avesta " news agency, quoting the news of the central bank, said that the inflation rate of Tajikistan in the first 7 months of this year was 3. 7 %.
截至本月11日,塔吉克斯坦"阿韦斯塔"通讯社援引中央银行的消息说,今年头7个月的塔吉克斯坦通货膨胀率为3.7%。
As indicated by the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
如报告所述,塔吉克斯坦前7个月的通货膨胀率为3.7%,7月的通货膨胀率为0.6%,而过去一年的通货膨胀率为6%。
As indicated in the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
如报告所述,塔吉克斯坦前7个月的通货膨胀率为3.7%,7月的通货膨胀率为0.6%,而过去一年的通货膨胀率为6%。
As stated by the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
如报告所述,塔吉克斯坦前7个月的通货膨胀率为3.7%,7月的通货膨胀率为0.6%,而过去一年的通货膨胀率为6%。
As highlighted by the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
正如报告所强调的,塔吉克斯坦的通胀率在前7个月是3.7%,7月份的通胀率为0.6%,而去年的通胀率为6%。
As revealed by the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
如报告所示,塔吉克斯坦前7个月的通货膨胀率为3.7%,7月的通货膨胀率为0.6%,而过去一年的通货膨胀率为6%。
As confirmed by the report, the inflation rate of Tajikistan was 3. 7 % in the first seven months. And the inflation rate in July was 0. 6 % while such rate in the past year was 6 %.
如报告所证实,塔吉克斯坦前7个月的通货膨胀率为3.7%,7月的通货膨胀率为0.6%,而过去一年的通货膨胀率为6%。
According to the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2016 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 was 5. 1 %.
报告称,塔吉克斯坦政府的目标是将2016年的年通胀率控制在7. 5%,而2015年为5.
According in the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2016 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 was 5. 1 %.

According said the report, the goal of the Tajikistan government is to control the annual inflation rate in 2016 as 7. 5 % while that in 2015 was 5. 1 %.

In addition, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial institutions in the aspect of prediction.
此外,报告还指出,就塔吉克斯坦2016年的经济发展和通货膨胀而言,政府和一些主要国际金融机构在预测方面存在着某些差异。

In a, the report also pointed out that in the case of economic development and inflation of Tajikistan in 2016, there are certain differences between the government and some major international financial institutions in the aspect of prediction.

According to the forecast of Ministry of Trade and Economic Development, the country's economic growth will reach 7 %, while the country's inflation is basically above this level.
根据贸易和经济发展部的预测,我国的经济增长将达到7%,而该国的通胀率将基本高于这一水平。

It is reported that, despite the international economic downturn, the devaluation of the Russian ruble and overseas remittance reduction and a series of other adverse external factors, 6 % growth was still achieved in the economy development of Tajikistan in 2015.
据报道,尽管国际经济衰退、俄罗斯卢布贬值、海外汇款减少以及一系列其他不利外部因素,2015年塔吉克斯坦的经济发展仍实现了6%的增长。
It was reported that, despite the international economic downturn, the devaluation of the Russian ruble and overseas remittance reduction and a series of other adverse external factors, 6 % growth was still achieved in the economy development of Tajikistan in 2015.
据报告,尽管国际经济衰退、俄罗斯卢布贬值、海外汇款减少以及一系列其他不利外部因素,2015年塔吉克斯坦的经济发展仍实现了6%的增长。

On August 11, when the reporter called Huang Yilin, who was in his Mianyang home, she said, " At that time, it was too urgent. And there was just one idea, which is to rescue people ! "
8月11日,当记者在绵阳家中叫黄一林时,她说:“当时太急了,只有一个想法,那就是救人。”

of August 11, when the reporter called Huang Yilin, who was in his Mianyang home, she said, " At that time, it was too urgent. And there was just one idea, which is to rescue people ! "

黄一林是中南林业科技大学景观建筑学院2015年级的学生。

Seeing the " little boy has just disappeared and the little girl desperately fluttered in the water, just with her little brain left above the water and keeping sinking ", Huang Yilin, who learned how to swim hurriedly jumped to rescue people.
看到“小男孩刚刚消失,小姑娘拼命地在水中跳动着,只是她的小脑袋从水面上掉下来,不停地沉下去。”他学会了游泳,立刻跳起来救人。

The first Youth Games in Yunnan Province will be held from August 13 to August 22 in De Hong Zhou Mang City.
首届青年运动会将于8月13日至22日在德洪州芒市举行。

The First Youth Games of Yunnan Province will be hosted by the Yunnan Provincial Sports Bureau and undertaken by Mang City People's Government. The opening ceremony will be held in the morning of the 13th day of the month.
云南省第一届青年运动会由云南省体育局主办,由芒市人民政府承办,开幕式于本月13日上午举行。

There are 11 items in the games, including track and field, soccer, basketball, tennis, volleyball, weightlifting, cycling, wrestling, gymnastics, martial arts and so on, involving 180 small items.

According to Chang Yin, the deputy director of the First Youth Games Organizing Committee and the deputy director of the Provincial Sports Bureau, by following the principle of " government-led, market operation, frugal race ", all preparation work has been in place.

In the morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 62-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片,62岁的姚明为长者拿到了半价的卡片。
In a morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 62-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.

In that morning of September 11, at Jining City Bus Company IC Card Sales Center, several elderly people are queuing to apply for a card. The 62-year-old Yao obtained his half-price card for the elderly.
九月十一日上午,在济宁市巴士公司IC卡销售中心,数名长者排队申请一张卡片,62岁的姚获得他给长者的半价卡片。

Prior to this, Jining Municipal Committee for Aging People, the Municipal Finance Bureau, and the Municipal Department of Transportation worked together to issue " A Notice for 60-64 years old people to take bus by half-price ticket ". The preferential policy will be implemented formally since this September 1.
在此之前,济宁市老百姓委员会、市财政局、市交通局共同发布了《60-64岁老人半价乘公共汽车的通知》,自今年9月1日起正式实行优惠政策。

The preferential policy will be implemented formally since this September 1.

" To save time for the elderly, the system is upgraded. The elderly free card is reduced from auditing twice per year to once per year. Elderly people with card do not need to commute twice. "
「为长者节省时间,系统已改善。长者免费卡由每年审计两次减至每年一次。长者如持卡,无须往返两班。」
" To spare time for the elderly, the system is upgraded. The elderly free card is reduced from auditing twice per year to once per year. Elderly people with card do not need to commute twice. "
「为长者提供业余时间,系统已改善。长者免费卡由每年审计两次减至每年一次,而持卡的长者无须往返两班。」

同时,廉政公署成立「深港股市交易互连机制」专责小组,积极推动筹建工作。筹建工作将於有关规例及技术设备全面制订后于今年展开。

People who sent a certain amount of mass fraud messages may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.
发送过一定数量的大规模欺诈信息的人即使没有成功欺诈,也可能因欺诈罪而受到处罚。

and who sent a certain amount of mass fraud messages may be punished for crime of swindling even if they did not succeed in fraud.

The court trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院判决,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
The trial trial of Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院的审判认定,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。

河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院的审案认定,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间,通过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。

The court trial in Nanyang Wolong District People's Court of Henan province found that the defendant Li Huiwang sent fraud information through the pseudo-base station equipment in Tongbai county and Nanyang district between September 30, 2009 and October 4, 2009.
河南省南阳沃龙区人民法院的审判裁定,被告李惠王于2009年9月30日至2009年10月4日期间透过同白县和南阳区的假基地站设备发送欺诈信息。
In the same year, at 10 a. m. on October 5, 2009, the defendant once again came to a hotel room of Nanyang City Wolong District, where they sent fraud messages via a fake base station. He was arrested by the police.
同年10月5日上午10时,被告再次来到南阳市沃龙区的一间酒店房间,通过一个假基地站发送欺诈信息,并被警方逮捕。

在评估之后,假基地站设备于2015年10月4日发送了62,228条短信,导致62,228个移动电话用户中断8秒至10分钟。

After the audit, the pseudo-base station equipment sent 62, 228 text messages on October 4, 2015. This resulted in 8 seconds to 10 minutes of interruption of 62, 228 mobile phone users.
在审计后,假基地站设备于2015年10月4日发送了62,228条短信,导致62,228个移动电话用户中断8秒至10分钟。
After legal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
法律程序终结后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After court proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
在法庭审讯后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After constitutional proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
在宪法程序后,法庭裁定,被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After civil proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
民事诉讼后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After criminal proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
刑事诉讼结束后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
After preliminary proceedings, the court held that the defendant Li Huiwang used pseudo-base station to send a total of 62, 228 fraud messages to a specific number of people. His behavior already constituted a crime of fraud.
初步审理后,法庭裁定被告李辉宏利用假基地站共向特定数目人士发送62,228条诈骗讯息。他的行为已构成诈骗罪。
As the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是未遂犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
As a defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
由于被告是罪犯,没有造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪态度良好,似宜采取较轻惩罚的意见。
As if defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
被告如企图犯罪,不造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,宜采取较轻处罚的意见。
the the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
被告人是企图犯罪,没有造成严重后果,在被抓时对认罪态度良好,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
of the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
被告人企图犯罪,未造成严重后果,在被抓获时对认罪有良好态度,宜采取较轻处罚的意见。
to the defendant was attempted criminal, not resulting in terrible consequences and having good attitude toward admission of guilt while being caught, it is advisable to take the opinion of giving a lesser punishment.
对被告的未遂犯罪,不造成严重后果,在被抓捕时对认罪有良好态度,似宜采取给予较轻惩罚的意见。
Consider the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward admission of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
以被告人的全面犯罪性质和认罪态度为例,判处他4年零6个月的监禁,并处1万元以下罚款。
the the comprehensive crime nature and the attitude toward admission of guilt of the defendant, he was sentenced to 4 years and 6 months of imprisonment, and fined 10, 000 yuan.
被告的犯罪性质和认罪态度,被判处4年零6个月的有期徒刑,并处1万元以下罚款。

According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
据吉林省林业局称,1998年美国、俄罗斯和其他国家联合监测的数据显示,吉林省只有4至6只东北虎和3至5只东北豹。
According by the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.
据吉林省林业局统计,1998年美国、俄罗斯和其他国家联合监测的数据显示,吉林省只有4至6只东北虎和3至5只东北豹。

According per the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the data jointly monitored by the United States and Russia and other countries in 1998 showed that Jilin Province only had 4 to 6 manchurian tigers and 3 to 5 Northeast leopards.

According to Yu Changchun, the Director of Jilin Provincial Department of Forestry Protection, Jilin province has gradually enhanced its conservation on wild animals in recent years. The number of populations of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards is growing significantly
吉林省林业保护局局长于昌春表示,近年来吉林省林业保护局局长逐步加强对野生动物的保护,东北地区东北虎类种群数量正明显增加

The latest monitoring data in 2015 showed that 27 wild manchurian tigers and 42 Northeastern leopards were monitored within Jilin province territory.
2015年的最新监测数据显示,吉林省境内监测了27只野生满洲虎和42只东北豹。
The last monitoring data in 2015 showed that 27 wild manchurian tigers and 42 Northeastern leopards were monitored within Jilin province territory.

The cooperation between China and Russia is significant for the population restoration and reproduction of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, which are flagship species for the wild animal protection in the Sino-Russia boundary area ,.
中俄两国的合作对东北虎种群的恢复和繁殖具有重要意义,东北虎是中俄边境地区保护野生动物的龙头物种。
The cooperation border China and Russia is significant for the population restoration and reproduction of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, which are flagship species for the wild animal protection in the Sino-Russia boundary area ,.

At the 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry department and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.
在9月11日结束的2016年中国湖春虎豹保护国际论坛上,中国和俄罗斯林业部门和动物保护组织第二次达成共识。
At a 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry department and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.

At summit 2016 China Hunchun Tiger and Leopard Protection International Forum which was terminated on September 11th, the forestry department and animal protection organization of China and Russia reached several consensuses for the second time.

According to the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the cooperation on enhancing the protection of tigers and leopards of China and Russia is not only quite pressing task for the protection of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, but also a priority to maintain the population health of tigers and leopards of Russia.
据吉林省林业局介绍,加强中俄虎豹保护的合作,不仅是保护东北东北虎虎的迫切任务,也是维护俄罗斯虎豹人口健康的优先事项。
According of the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the cooperation on enhancing the protection of tigers and leopards of China and Russia is not only quite pressing task for the protection of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, but also a priority to maintain the population health of tigers and leopards of Russia.
吉林省林业局认为,加强中俄虎豹保护的合作,不仅是保护东北东北虎虎的迫切任务,也是维护俄罗斯虎豹人口健康的优先事项。

According stated the Jilin Provincial Forestry Department, the cooperation on enhancing the protection of tigers and leopards of China and Russia is not only quite pressing task for the protection of manchurian tigers and Northeastern leopards, but also a priority to maintain the population health of tigers and leopards of Russia.

孙福建是党的干部,但是在中国共产党第十八届全国代表大会后,他粗暴地违背党的纪律,失去了理想和信念,此外,他不动声色,违反规则,这种行为既卑鄙又严重。

After the case, Haikou City Public Security Bureau of Interpol detachment leaders attach great importance and immediately organize a detachment of elite troops to take the initiative to investigate.
案件后,海口市公安局的国际刑警组织分遣队领导人高度重视并立即组织一支精锐部队分遣队,主动进行调查。

Greenland sharks are also known as small head sleeping sharks, widely distributed in Greenland and the North Atlantic waters around Iceland. It has the length of 4 to 5 meters in their adult age.
格陵兰鲨也被称为小头睡性鲨鱼,广泛分布在格陵兰和冰岛周围的北大西洋水域,成年时长4至5米。

A new study led by Julius Nelson of the University of Copenhagen, Denmark, turned to the use of Greenland shark's ocular lens for radioactive carbon dating.
由丹麦哥本哈根大学的朱利叶斯·纳尔逊领导的一项新的研究转向了格陵兰鲨眼镜在放射性碳约会中的应用。
A was study led by Julius Nelson of the University of Copenhagen, Denmark, turned to the use of Greenland shark's ocular lens for radioactive carbon dating.

The researchers thus wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 211 years ).
因此,研究者在论文中写道,格陵兰鲨被称作地球上寿命最长的脊椎动物,它超越了前一位长寿冠军黑右鲸的年龄 ( 211 岁 ) 。
The researchers therefore wrote in the paper that the Greenland shark was known as the vertebrate with the longest life span on the Earth, surpassing the age of the previous longevity champion black right whale ( 211 years ).

From the point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望增强,汇率总体稳定。

From in point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望增强,汇率总体稳定。
From a point of market performance, over the past year, the two-way floating characteristics of RMB exchange rate is outstanding. The elasticity of exchange is expected to be strengthened and the exchange rate is expected to be generally stable.
从市场表现来看,人民币汇率的双向浮动特征在过去一年中尚显突出,汇率弹性有望增强,汇率总体稳定。
Ever since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.
自汇率改革以来,人民币兑美元汇率的波动就经常出现,在波动过程中,人民币的汇率会起起伏波动。
Ever after the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.
汇率改革结束后,人民币兑美元汇率经常出现波动,在汇率改革过程中经常出现起伏波动。
Ever Since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.
自从汇率改革以来,人民币兑美元汇率的波动就经常出现,在波动过程中,人民币的汇率会起起伏波动。

the since the exchange reform, the fluctuation of RMB against the US dollar often appears, with ups and downs during the process.

Last year, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The appreciation of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
去年,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,人民币兑美元汇率在过去十年中大幅升值。

Last in, the last remittance measure before " 8. 11 " exchange reform was carried out in 2005. The appreciation of yuan against dollar was significant during the last 10 years.
最后,2005年进行了“8.11”外汇改革前的最后一次汇款措施,人民币兑美元汇率在近10年中大幅升值。
Since the implementation of the new exchange reform, the previous appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.
新的汇率改革实施以来,人民币的上扬状态发生了变化,人民币一年的汇率中心对等率为8%左右。
the the implementation of the new exchange reform, the previous appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.

in the implementation of the new exchange reform, the previous appreciation state of RMB was changed. The central parity rate of RMB exchange rate in one year was about 8 %.

This October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR weight currency.
今年10月1日,国际货币基金组织(IMF)将正式接受人民币, 人民币将变成SDR权值货币.
of October 1, the International Monetary Fund will officially accept the yuan, which will become SDR weight currency.

This week, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 months of this year, China's import and export value of 13. 21 trillion yuan, down 3 % over the same period last year.
本周,中国海关总署发布的统计表明,今年头7个月中国进出口值为13.21万亿元,较去年同期下降3%。
This month, China's General Administration of Customs released statistics show that the first 7 months of this year, China's import and export value of 13. 21 trillion yuan, down 3 % over the same period last year.

上海警方在4个月内抓获了3400多只盗贼,打击了157个“抢劫诈骗”团伙
