In late August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三(Shinzo Abe)将于8月底前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In mid August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月中旬前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In early August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月初前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In Late August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月下旬前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议,据《中国之音晚间新闻高峰》报道。
In August August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于8月前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
In July August, Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will go to Kenya to attend the 6th African Development Conference, according to the Evening News Peak of Voice of China.
日本首相安倍晋三将于今年8月前往肯尼亚出席第六届非洲发展会议。
The African Development Conference was dominated by Japan, and the previous five meetings were held in Tokyo, Japan or Yokohama, so this meeting will be the first move to Africa.
非洲 发展 会议 的 主要 成员 是 日本, 前 五 次 会议 在 东京 、 日本 或 横滨 举行, 因此, 这次 会议 将 是 向 非洲 迈出 的 第一步 。

Japan's " application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council " began in the early 90s of the last century while the African-sponsored African Development Conference also began in 1993. This is not a coincidence.
日本 “ 成为 联合国 安全理事会 常任理事国 的 申请 ” 始于 上个 世纪 90 年代 初, 而 由 非洲 赞助 的 非洲 发展 会议 也 于 1993年 开始, 这 不是 一 个 巧合 。

Africa has 53 seats in the United Nations and is therefore an important ticket bunker of the United Nation. How can Japan give up Africa if it wanted to join the United Nations Security Council ?
非洲在联合国有53个席位,因此是一个重要的票房,日本如何才能放弃非洲,如果它想加入联合国安理会?

Abe has announced here that in order to stabilize the stability of sub-Saharan African countries, it will provide 100 billion yen ( about RMB 6. 1 billion ) in five years.

Abe has announced below that in order to stabilize the stability of sub-Saharan African countries, it will provide 100 billion yen ( about RMB 6. 1 billion ) in five years.
为了稳定撒哈拉以南非洲国家的稳定,安倍宣布,五年内将提供1,000亿日元(约合61亿 元 ) 。
Observers generally believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally think that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers generally consider that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士普遍认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers largely believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察家普遍认为,日本慷慨地支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers usually believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
观察人士通常认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
Observers therefore believe that there are two purposes behind Japan's generosity toward Africa : first, to increase Japan's presence in Africa ; second, to win the support of African countries on the application to become a permanent member of the United Nations Security Council.
因此,观察家认为,日本慷慨支持非洲有两个目的:第一,增加日本在非洲的存在;第二,在申请成为联合国安理会常任理事国方面赢得非洲国家的支持。
" In terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" In regards of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
" On terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“在政治方面,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江说。
" The terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“从政治的角度来看,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江说。
" the terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“从政治的角度来看,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江说。
" on terms of politics, Africa is relatively lagging behind, but there are many African countries. So Japan has always regarded it as the so-called'big ticket field ,'" said Yang Bojiang, an expert for Japanese issues.
“从政治角度讲,非洲相对落后,但有很多非洲国家,因此日本一直把它看作是所谓的“大票场”,日本问题专家杨波江(音译)说。
Japan will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
日本 今后 不会 放弃, 其 关于 非洲 的 工作 将 不会 结束, 而 将 逐渐 加强 。
the will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.

今后不会放弃,其关于非洲的工作不会终止,而会逐步加强。

今后 也 不会 放弃, 其 关于 非洲 的 工作 将 不会 终止, 而 将 逐渐 加强 。
in will not give up in the future and its work on Africa will not be terminated but gradually strengthened.
今后 将 不会 放弃, 其 关于 非洲 的 工作 将 不会 终止, 而 将 逐渐 加强 。
Economically, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the domestic demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
日本在经济上具有很强的生产能力,但其国内市场相对有限,特别是人口老龄化情况下,国内需求相对疲软。
Economic overall, Japan enjoys a strong production capacity, but its domestic market is relatively limited. In particular, the domestic demand is relatively weak in the context of aging population.
整体经济而言,日本的生产能力很强,但其国内市场相对有限,特别是人口老龄化情况下的内需相对疲软。

To achieve its own goals, Japan should firstly do a good job with the surrounding countries. And Japan needs to have a correct attitude no matter in geopolitical competition or in the national dispute or understanding of a historical problem.
为了实现自己的目标,日本首先应该和周边国家一起做好自己的工作,而无论在地缘政治竞争中,在民族纠纷中,或在对历史问题的理解中,日本都需要采取正确的态度。

The current research focuses on the profound changes in global politics, economy, science and technology, culture and religion, and the opportunities and challenges that these changes bring to national governance, leadership, and global governance.
目前的研究侧重于全球政治、经济、科学和技术、文化和宗教的深刻变化,以及这些变化给国家治理、领导和全球治理带来的机遇和挑战。

Traditional customs introduced a new bright spot " 2016 Bon Culture Festival "-The opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
传统风俗引入新亮点2016博文化节--香港维多利亚公园开幕典礼
Traditional traditions introduced a new bright spot " 2016 Bon Culture Festival "-The Opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
传统在香港维多利亚公园的开幕式上引入了“2016年博览会文化节”的新亮点
Traditional rites introduced a new bright spot " 2016 Bon Culture Festival "-The Opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
传统仪式推出「2016博文节」新亮点--香港维多利亚公园开幕典礼
Traditional rituals introduced a new bright spot " 2016 Bon Culture Festival "-The Opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
传统礼仪推出「2016博文化节」新亮点--香港维多利亚公园开幕典礼
Traditional festivities introduced a new bright spot " 2016 Bon Culture Festival "-The Opening Ceremony of Victoria Park, Hong Kong
传统节日推出新亮点「2016博文节」-香港维多利亚公园开幕典礼
Gongs and drums of music, the traditional snacks, fancy decoration and stormy crowd scene.
鼓鼓鼓鼓乐 、 传统点心 、 花哨装饰和风雨般的人群场面.
tos and drums of music, the traditional snacks, fancy decoration and stormy crowd scene.
随声听音乐、鼓鼓乐、传统零食、华丽的装饰和暴风雨般的人群场面。
thes and drums of music, the traditional snacks, fancy decoration and stormy crowd scene.
音乐的鼓鼓、传统小吃、华丽的装饰和暴风雨般的人群场面。
ands and drums of music, the traditional snacks, fancy decoration and stormy crowd scene.
和鼓鼓的音乐,传统零食,华丽的装饰和暴风雨般的人群场面。
ofs and drums of music, the traditional snacks, fancy decoration and stormy crowd scene.
乐鼓、传统零食、华丽的装饰和暴风雨般的人群场面。
Gongs and drums of music, the traditional snacks, variety decoration and stormy crowd scene.
鼓鼓鼓鼓乐 、 传统点心 、 各种装饰和风雨般的人群场面.
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州社区组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Youth Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州青年组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow community Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州社区组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Cultural Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港潮州文化组织联合会主办的「2016年清新文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
Organized by the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Association Organizations, " 2016 Bon Culture Festival " was held in Victoria Park between the 12th day and the 14th day of the month. It's the largest grand club in Hong Kong.
由香港卓协联办的「2016博文化节」于本月十二日至十四日在维多利亚公园举行,是香港最大的大俱乐部。
In addition to the continuation of the existing " Climbing Competition ", " parent basin for the heap " for the entire family is also added.
除了延续现有的“攀登比赛”之外,还添加了全家的“母池堆”。

Bon culture history is introduced in the form of comic books. In addition, Bon theme 3D self-timer area, traditional snack area and traditional craft flow classroom are set up at the scene, attracting many friends and overseas travelers for visit.
以漫画书的形式介绍了博文文化史,并在现场设置了博文主题3D自定时区、传统快餐区和传统工艺流程教室,吸引了众多朋友和海外旅游者前来参观。
Bon culture History is introduced in the form of comic books. In addition, Bon theme 3D self-timer area, traditional snack area and traditional craft flow classroom are set up at the scene, attracting many friends and overseas travelers for visit.
文文化史以漫画书的形式引入,文主题3D自定时区、传统快餐区和传统工艺流程教室在现场设置,吸引众多朋友和海外旅游者参观。
Bon culture culture is introduced in the form of comic books. In addition, Bon theme 3D self-timer area, traditional snack area and traditional craft flow classroom are set up at the scene, attracting many friends and overseas travelers for visit.
文雅文化以漫画书的形式引入,同时,文雅主题3D自定时间区、传统快餐区和传统工艺流程教室在现场设置,吸引了众多朋友和海外旅游者前来参观。

A French couple lingered at the scene for almost 3 hours and experienced a lot in the mini flower card flow classroom.
一对法国夫妇在现场逗留了近3个小时,在迷你花卡流的教室里体验了很多。

They said, although there are similar festivities commemorating the ancestors, the atmosphere is quite solemn. But here you can enjoy music, food and also can learn traditional craft.
他们说,虽然有类似的纪念祖先的节日,气氛却很庄严,但是在这里你可以享受音乐,吃东西,还可以学习传统手工艺。
They stated, although there are similar festivities commemorating the ancestors, the atmosphere is quite solemn. But here you can enjoy music, food and also can learn traditional craft.

She said, " It is quite pleasant to see sizable and organized ancestor worship ceremony in such a busy financial metropolis of Hong Kong ".
她说,“在如此繁忙的香港金融大都市里,看到规模庞大、组织有序的祖先崇拜仪式,真令人高兴。”
She concluded, " It is quite pleasant to see sizable and organized ancestor worship ceremony in such a busy financial metropolis of Hong Kong ".

" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Bon Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青春的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道,博文节背后的文化就是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Mon Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道蒙节背后的文化是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the May Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道五月节背后的文化是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Grand Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道大庆文化背后是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the A Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人懂得一个节的文化是表达孝道和感恩。
" We hope that through the youthful activities and layout of the scene, so that young people know that the culture behind the Mar Festival is to express the filial piety and thanksgiving. "
我们希望通过青年的活动和场景布局,让年轻人知道,马会背后的文化就是表达孝道和感恩。

It is understood that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,2011年,香港千州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
It was understood that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,2011年,香港千州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。

据了解,2011年,香港仇州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
It is believed that the Federation of Hong Kong Chiu Chow Community Organizations is listed as " national intangible cultural heritage list " in 2011.
据悉,2011年,香港仇州社区组织联合会被列为“全国非物质文化遗产名录”。
On the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧团收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,前往墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
On the night of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧场收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
the the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧场收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
of the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.

in the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧团收看了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
and the evening of the 11th day of the month, China National Peking Opera Theater took its famous TV play " White Snake " and traveled thousands of miles to Mexico City. They presented the local people with an authentic Peking Opera feast in the Mexican National Palace.
和本月十一日晚上,中国国家京剧剧院拿起了著名的电视剧《白蛇》,飞向墨西哥城数千英里,在墨西哥国家宫内为当地人民举行了真正的京剧宴会。
As the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了七部歌剧。
As a key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的主要演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了七部歌剧。
As tour key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
作为8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”的巡回重点演出项目,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了七部歌剧。
of the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
在8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”重点演出项目中,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等5个城市演出了7部歌剧。
in the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
在8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”重点演出项目中,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等五大城市演出了七部歌剧。
to the key performance project of " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year ", from August 9 to 23, China National Peking Opera Theater performed seven opera in the Mexican capital Mexico City and Córdoba, Juarez and other five cities.
在8月9日至23日“中拉美文化交流年”重点演出项目中,中国京剧剧院在墨西哥首都墨西哥城、科尔多瓦、华雷斯等5个城市演出了7部歌剧。
The audience sometimes smiled and sometimes applauded for the changing and concluding of the " White Snake " episode and the actor's singing.
观众有时会微笑,有时会因《白蛇》的改编和结束以及演员的歌声而鼓掌。
the audience sometimes smiled and sometimes applauded for the changing and concluding of the " White Snake " episode and the actor's singing.

I watched the performance of Marissa Jimenez Kachie accompanying her daughter in the Peking opera performance 15 years ago.
我观看了15年前玛丽莎·希门尼斯·卡奇在北京歌剧表演中陪伴女儿的表演。

I watched the performance of Marissa Jimenez Kachie accompanying her son in the Peking opera performance 15 years ago.
我观看了15年前玛丽莎·希门尼斯·卡奇在北京歌剧表演中陪伴儿子的表演。
" This is a fantastic performance. Its music, lighting and stage performances are impressive to me...... I think it is necessary to let her daughter understand the Chinese culture and Chinese opera art. "
“ 这真是一场精彩的表演, 音乐, 灯光和舞台表演让我印象深刻...... 我认为有必要让她女儿了解中国文化和中国歌剧艺术。”
" This was a fantastic performance. Its music, lighting and stage performances are impressive to me...... I think it is necessary to let her daughter understand the Chinese culture and Chinese opera art. "
“ 这真是一场精彩的表演, 音乐, 灯光和舞台表演让我印象深刻...... 我认为有必要让她女儿了解中国文化和中国歌剧艺术。”
The enthusiasm of Mexican audience left a deep impression on the young actress of lady white.
墨西哥观众的热情给年轻的白人女演员留下了深刻的印象.
The enthusiasm of Mexican audience left a deep impression upon the young actress of lady white.

墨西哥观众的热情给她年轻的白人女演员留下了深刻的印象.
The excitement of Mexican audience left a deep impression on the young actress of lady white.
墨西哥观众的兴奋情绪给年轻的白人女演员留下了深刻的印象.
" It never occurred to me that the Mexican audience were so enthusiastic. I had some worries about whether they could understand the story, but it was beyond my expectation to see them catch the story and the laughter today.
我从未想到墨西哥观众如此热心,我担心他们能否理解这个故事,但是今天看到他们领悟这个故事和笑声实在超出我的预料。

Qiu Xiaoqi, the Chinese ambassador to Mexico, said that the various cultural exchange activities of this year's " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year " promoted the two peoples to deepen mutual understanding and enhance their friendship.
中国驻墨西哥大使邱晓琪表示,今年“中拉美文化交流年”的多种文化交流活动,促进了两国人民加深相互理解,增进友谊。
Qiu Zhaoqi, the Chinese ambassador to Mexico, said that the various cultural exchange activities of this year's " Sino-Latin American Cultural Exchange Year " promoted the two peoples to deepen mutual understanding and enhance their friendship.

Next year is the 45th anniversary for the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Mexico. By then there will be more cultural exchange activities held in China and Mexico.
明年是中墨建交45周年,届时两国将开展更多的文化交流活动。

Liu Cigui stressed that Sanya should firmly grasp the historical development opportunities and take the pilot work of " Double Restoration and Dual City " as key content to give full play to the leading role of demonstration during the economic and social development in order to firmly grasp historical development opportunities.

Zhang Qi, the Provincial Standing Committee and Sanya Municipal Party Committee Secretary, Wang Lu, vice governor and Lu Zhiyuan, secretary general of provincial government participated in the research seminars.

In the 14 years of her sports career, Deng Yaping won a total of 18 world championships, becoming the first Chinese to win four Olympic gold medals in China's Olympic history.
在她14年的体育生涯中,邓亚平总共赢得了18个世界冠军,成为在中国奥运史上赢得4枚金牌的第一个中国人。

Coming entering the 14th season of his career, James needs to better conserve his strength and get ready for the playoffs.
詹姆斯即将进入他职业生涯的第14个赛季,他需要更好地保持自己的力量,为季后赛做好准备。
Coming beginning the 14th season of his career, James needs to better conserve his strength and get ready for the playoffs.
詹姆斯开始他的第14个职业生涯,他需要更好地保持他的力量和准备季后赛。
Coming on the 14th season of his career, James needs to better conserve his strength and get ready for the playoffs.
詹姆斯进入了他的职业生涯的第14个赛季,他需要更好地保持自己的力量,为季后赛做好准备。
Therefore, in the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.
因此,在常规赛赛季,詹姆斯的能力可能会进一步下降,他会给欧文更多的负担,但他仍然很容易成为联赛前三名球员。
Therefore, during the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.
因此,在常规赛期间,詹姆斯的能力可能会进一步下降,他会给欧文更多的负担,但他仍然很容易成为联赛前三名球员。
Therefore, after the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.
因此,在常规赛结束后,詹姆斯的能力可能会进一步下降,他会给欧文更多的负担,但他仍然很容易成为联赛前三名球员。
the, in the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.
在常规赛季,詹姆斯的能力可能会进一步下降,他会给欧文更多的压力,但他仍然很容易成为联赛前三名球员。
and, in the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.
而且,在常规赛季,詹姆斯的能力可能会进一步下降,他会给欧文更多的压力,但他仍然很容易成为联赛前三名球员。
of, in the regular season, James's capability is likely to further decline, he will give more weight to Owen to bear, but he will still easily become the league's top three players.

“ 我一定要继续我学到的中国去申请俄罗斯. ”
" I must carry forward what I learned in Beijing to apply to Russia ".

to the 12th day of the month of the local time, Huang Jing, chairman of the Moscow Overseas Chinese Association said excitedly while she saw the reporter of Chinanews. com.
莫斯科海外华人协会主席黄京在看到中国新闻网记者时激动地说。

不久前,她参加了由中国国务院海外华人事务办公室主办、济南大学主办的“华侨文化社区华人人才 ( 书法 、 绘画 ) ” 培训.

Britain settle for silver in rugby sevens after Fiji masterclass sees them take gold
英国在斐济大师们看到七人榄球队拿起金牌后,于是选择了七人榄球队的银牌
Britain settle for silver in rugby sevens after the masterclass sees them take gold
英国人在主班看到七人榄球队拿起金牌后,便决定以七人榄球队的成绩夺得银牌
Britain settle for silver in rugby sevens after a masterclass sees them take gold
英国人在七人榄球赛上看到他们拿了金牌,于是决定选择七人榄球赛
Great Britain's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在7号橄榄球赛决赛中击败了英国令人印象深刻的决赛,在里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场,他们被全面击败43比7。
Great England's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,大英格兰在橄榄球7号的比赛在决赛中被斐济队击败,最后一场障碍赛于上周四晚上在里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场被全面击败。
Great Kingdom's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在橄榄球7号决赛决赛中以43比7全面击败了英国队。
Great GB's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,在位于里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场,大英超在橄榄球7号的比赛在决赛中被斐济队击败,在决赛决赛决赛时,他们遭到了43至7的重击。
the Britain's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在7号橄榄球赛决赛中击败了英国令人印象深刻的决赛,在里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场,他们被全面击败43比7。
and Britain's impressive run in the Rugby 7s was brought to a crashing halt at the final hurdle by Fiji in the final on Thursday night when they were comprehensively beaten 43-7 at the Deodoro Stadium here in Rio.
周四晚上,斐济队在7号橄榄球赛决赛决赛时,在里约热内卢的德奥多罗体育场,全场43比7被击败,这令英国在7号橄榄球赛中令人印象深刻的决赛障碍赛陷于瘫痪。
Fiji gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
斐济 给 了 一 个 处理 、 卸载 、 侧身 踩踏 、 支持 、 跑步 和 野蛮 力量 的 大师 班, 以 赢得 他们 的 第一块 任何 颜色 的 奥运会 奖牌 。
the gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
为了赢得金牌--他们的第一块任何颜色的奥运奖牌--在操控、卸载、侧身、支持、排球、跑步和强力方面,都给了大师级。
in gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
奖项授予了驾驭、卸载、侧身、支持、排球、跑步和强力以赢得金牌的大师级,他们获得了第一枚任何颜色的奥运奖牌。
and gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.

a gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
给一个驾驭、卸载、侧身、支持、排球、跑步和野蛮力量的大师级,以赢得他们的第一块金牌,任何颜色的奥运奖牌。
of gave a masterclass in handling, off-loading, side-stepping, support play, running lines and brute strength to win gold-their first Olympic medal of any colour.
给主修课的处理,卸载,侧身,支持游戏,跑线和野蛮力量赢得金牌,他们的第一个奥运奖牌的任何颜色。
Defeat came with the non-too shabby consolation of silver-Britain's third of the day-and they could be proud of their efforts in the inaugural Olympic 7s tournament in which they beat New Zealand, Argentina and South Africa along the way.
英国银牌大赛的第三场比赛给英国银牌公司带来了不那么破败的安慰,他们可以自豪地参加奥运会七大赛开幕式,在比赛中他们一路击败新西兰、阿根廷和南非。
Defeat came with a non-too shabby consolation of silver-Britain's third of the day-and they could be proud of their efforts in the inaugural Olympic 7s tournament in which they beat New Zealand, Argentina and South Africa along the way.
英国银牌大赛的第三场比赛,在这场比赛中,英国银牌大赛在新西兰、阿根廷和南非的首场比赛中夺冠,他们对此感到十分自豪。
Defeat came with an non-too shabby consolation of silver-Britain's third of the day-and they could be proud of their efforts in the inaugural Olympic 7s tournament in which they beat New Zealand, Argentina and South Africa along the way.
英国银牌大赛的第三场比赛,在这场比赛中,英国银牌大赛在新西兰、阿根廷和南非的首场比赛中夺冠,他们对此感到十分自豪。

A front-row seat to the stunning architecture of the Los Angeles Central Library
位于洛杉矶中央图书馆的令人惊叹的建筑的前排座位
A front-row seat to the stunning Architecture of the Los Angeles Central Library
位于洛杉矶中央图书馆大楼前排的座位
Learn more about the history of downtown's Central Library as the Society of Architectural Historians / Southern California Chapter hosts a salon with Arnold Schwartzman and Stephen Gee, authors of the new book " Los Angeles Central Library : A History of its Art and Architecture ".
了解更多关于市中心图书馆的历史作为建筑史学家协会南加州分会与阿诺德·施瓦茨曼和史蒂芬·吉主持沙龙的新书《洛杉矶中央图书馆:艺术与建筑史》的作者。

In July 2016, compared to the previous month, an increase was observed in the price of the following groups of consumer goods : food and non-alcoholic beverages ( 1. 7 % ) ; transport ( 1. 8 % ) ; recreation and culture ( 6. 3 % ) ; restaurants and hotels ( 1. 2 % ) ; miscellaneous goods and services ( 0. 3 % ).

Officials from the United States Central Command altered intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.
美国中央司令部官员在周四发布的一份报告中称,美国中央司令部官员修改了情报报告,以显示在伊拉克和叙利亚对伊斯兰国发动战争的情况比当地发生的事件更为乐观。
Officials from the U States Central Command altered intelligence reports to portray a more optimistic picture of the war against the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria than events on the ground warranted, a congressional panel said in a report issued Thursday.

The interim report, from a task force established by the Republican chairmen of the House Armed Services Committee, Intelligence Committee and Defense Appropriations Subcommittee, found " widespread dissatisfaction " among Central Command intelligence analysts, who said superiors were doctoring their assessments of American efforts to defeat the Islamic State.
这份由众议院军事事务委员会、情报委员会和国防拨款小组委员会共和党主席组成的特别工作组的中期报告发现,中央司令部情报分析师“普遍不满”,他们表示,上级正在修改他们对美国击败伊斯兰国的努力的评估。

S. antiterrorism efforts than was warranted by facts on the ground and were consistently more positive than analysis produced by other elements of the intelligence community, " a news release about the report said.

例如,Centcom的一名官员公开表示,收回摩苏尔的重大军事攻击最早可能从2015年4月或5月开始。

From the middle of 2014 to the middle of 2015, the United States Central Command's most senior intelligence leaders manipulated the command's intelligence products to downplay the threat from ISIS in Iraq.

" Between 2014 and 2015, Centcom created an inadequate insular process for producing intelligence assessments on ISIL and Iraqi Security Forces, " Representative Adam B. Schiff, the committee's top Democrat, said in a statement.
委员会首席民主党议员亚当·施吉夫在一份声明中说,在2014年至2015年期间,Centcom为对伊黎伊斯兰国和伊拉克安全部队进行情报评估创造了一个不适当的孤立进程。
This process, Mr. Schiff said, " stalled the release of intelligence products, " hurt morale among analysts and " insufficiently accommodated dissenting views. "
施夫说,这一过程“阻碍了情报产品的发放,伤害了分析师的士气,也未能充分包容异议。”

She grew up in Blue Bell, Pa., first picked up a field hockey stick when she was 3 ( her twin older sisters played the sport at Drexel ) and joined the national team when she was 16, becoming its youngest player ever.
她在爸爸的蓝贝尔(BlueBell)长大,3岁时(她的双胞胎姐姐在德雷塞尔打球),她第一次捡起一支曲棍球棍,16岁的时候就加入了国家队,成为了足球队有史以来最年轻的球员。

Their new, collaborative work, " A Square Meal, " which will be published Tuesday by Harper, is a history of American food in the Great Depression.
哈珀周二将发表他们的新的合作作品《一广场美食》(Aquare Meal),这是美国大萧条时期的食品史。

Showing some culinary solidarity of their own, they met a reporter for dinner at Eisenberg's Sandwich Shop, a tiny no-frills lunch counter in the Flatiron district that has been in business since the year of the crash, 1929.

Equally fraught was the new budget diet : Mystery dishes like loaves and casseroles became staples, the casserole a " wonderful way to repurpose leftovers, " Ms. Ziegelman noted, because cooks could hide unappetizing ingredients under a creamy coating of sauce.
同样令人烦恼的是新的节食计划:像面包和砂锅这样的神秘菜肴成了主食,砂锅是一种“修复剩菜的绝妙方法”,齐格尔曼女士说,因为厨师可以把不讨人喜欢的成分藏在酱油的奶油涂层中。

和以前或以后一样,国内经济学家——包括1923年至1943年担任美国联邦家政经济局局长的路易斯·斯坦利(Louise Stanley)。
Publishing recipes and articles in newspapers and magazines, they encouraged women to become " budgeteers " and rise to the challenge of transforming glop like creamed spaghetti with carrots into tasty dishes.
在报纸和杂志上发表菜谱和文章,鼓励妇女成为“预算人”,并迎接挑战,把像奶油般的加了胡萝卜的面条变成美味的菜肴。

On Monday, OPEC Chairman and Qatar Energy Minister Sada said OPEC will hold an informal meeting during the International Energy Forum on September 26-28.
星期一,欧佩克主席和卡塔尔能源部长萨达说,欧佩克将在9月26日至28日国际能源论坛期间举行一次非正式会议。
On Thursday, OPEC Chairman and Qatar Energy Minister Sada said OPEC will hold an informal meeting during the International Energy Forum on September 26-28.
欧佩克主席和卡塔尔能源部长萨达星期四说,欧佩克将在9月26日至28日国际能源论坛期间举行一次非正式会议。

The monthly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的月度报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The quarterly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克星期三的季度报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The weekly report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.

The annual report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克星期三的年度报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The financial report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克周三的财务报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量日增加46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
The daily report of OPEC on Wednesday showed that the output of the entire OPEC organization in July, including Gabon, increased by 46, 000 barrels / day to 33. 11 million barrels / day.
欧佩克星期三的每日报告显示,包括加蓬在内的整个欧佩克组织7月份的产量每天增加了46 000桶,达到331 100万桶/日。
OPEC also said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the degree of excess supply to the market.
欧佩克还在一份月度报告中表示,原油价格的低迷促使全球炼油商生产更精炼的石油,从而提高了对市场的过度供应。
OPEC has said in a monthly report that low crude oil prices have prompted global refiners to produce more refined oil, thus increasing the degree of excess supply to the market.

All localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地医疗单位如有非法的医疗广告,举报重点应放在过去,并屡次受到处罚,作为检查重点。
and localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
地方应将有非法医疗广告的医疗机构、以过去为重点的投诉、屡次受到处罚的医疗机构作为检查重点。

in localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.
各地对有非法医疗广告的医疗机构,应当以过去为主,屡次以检查为主进行处罚。
of localities should take medical institutions which have illegal medical advertising, complaints focusing on the past and have repeatedly been punished as a focus of inspection.

National Health Commission and the State Administration of Traditional Chinese Medicine will timely carry out supervision on the supervision and inspection work of some provinces.

in present, three plates are set up for doctor's client side, respectively, for doctors to continue education, social exchange and communication.

The following services are provided, including online learning, case discussion and academic exchange ; social platform for the exchange of doctors of the same hospital and department ; legal assistance, business support and other services required by doctor-patient relationship or personal life.
提供以下服务,包括网上学习、个案讨论和学术交流;同一医院和部门的医生交流社会平台;法律援助、商业支持以及医患关系或个人生活所需的其他服务。
The following services the provided, including online learning, case discussion and academic exchange ; social platform for the exchange of doctors of the same hospital and department ; legal assistance, business support and other services required by doctor-patient relationship or personal life.
提供下列服务,包括在线学习、个案讨论和学术交流;同一医院和部门医生交流的社会平台;法律援助、商业支持以及医患关系或个人生活所需的其他服务。
The following services is provided, including online learning, case discussion and academic exchange ; social platform for the exchange of doctors of the same hospital and department ; legal assistance, business support and other services required by doctor-patient relationship or personal life.
提供以下服务,包括网上学习、个案讨论和学术交流;同一医院和部门医生交流的社会平台;法律援助、商业支持以及医患关系或个人生活所需的其他服务。

In this regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。

In this matter, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这件事情上,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。
In that regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。
In which regard, the doctor reminded that staying up late has health risks and may lead to cardiovascular disease.
在这方面,医生提醒说,熬夜有健康风险,并可能导致心血管疾病。
If you stay up for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间熬夜,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay awake for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间保持清醒,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压和心血管疾病。
If you stay out for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间外出,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,不能正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay down for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间卧床,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
If you stay asleep for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间保持睡眠,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压和心血管疾病。
If you stay tired for a long time, the hormone will have a lot of secretion and your body will continue to be in a state of intense excitement and cannot have normal recovery. This may easily cause vasoconstriction, blood pressure and thus cardiovascular disease.
如果你长时间疲劳,激素会有很多分泌物,你的身体会继续处于极度兴奋的状态,无法正常恢复,这很容易导致血管收缩、血压,从而引起心血管疾病。
Han Zhiyuan reminded people who have high blood pressure, high blood sugar, high blood lipids, smoking habits, family history and other cardiovascular risk factors may easily suffer from cardiovascular disease if staying up late.
韩志远提醒那些有高血压、高血糖、高血脂、吸烟习惯、家庭历史和其他心血管危险因素的人,如果熬夜就很容易患心血管疾病。

Han Zhiyuan reminded people who have high blood pressure, in blood sugar, high blood lipids, smoking habits, family history and other cardiovascular risk factors may easily suffer from cardiovascular disease if staying up late.
韩志远提醒有高血压、高血糖、高血脂、吸烟习惯、家庭历史和其他心血管危险因素的人,如果熬夜就可能容易患心血管疾病。
Han Zhiyuan reminded people whom have high blood pressure, high blood sugar, high blood lipids, smoking habits, family history and other cardiovascular risk factors may easily suffer from cardiovascular disease if staying up late.
韩志远提醒那些有高血压、高血糖、高血脂、吸烟习惯、家庭历史和其他心血管危险因素的人,如果熬夜就很容易患心血管疾病。
If you stay up late, then your cardiovascular function will be affected, your gastrointestinal function, immune system, neuroendocrine system will also be affected, and even the risk of cancer will increase.
如果你熬夜,你的心血管功能就会受到影响,你的胃肠功能、免疫系统、神经内分泌系统也会受到影响,甚至癌症的风险也会增加。
If you get up late, then your cardiovascular function will be affected, your gastrointestinal function, immune system, neuroendocrine system will also be affected, and even the risk of cancer will increase.
如果你晚起,你的心血管功能就会受到影响,你的胃肠功能、免疫系统、神经内分泌系统也会受到影响,甚至癌症的风险也会增加。
If you sleep up late, then your cardiovascular function will be affected, your gastrointestinal function, immune system, neuroendocrine system will also be affected, and even the risk of cancer will increase.
如果你睡得很晚,你的心血管功能就会受到影响,你的胃肠功能、免疫系统、神经内分泌系统也会受到影响,甚至癌症的风险也会增加。
If you spend up late, then your cardiovascular function will be affected, your gastrointestinal function, immune system, neuroendocrine system will also be affected, and even the risk of cancer will increase.

1. Be not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.
1.不要每天熬夜,你可以偶尔整夜看最喜爱的体育活动,看第二天复播的其他体育活动。
1. No not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.
例句这个人说:"不要每天熬夜,你偶尔可以整夜看最喜爱的运动节目,看第二天复播的其他运动节目。
1. The not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.

1. You not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.

1. Do Not stay up late every day. You can occasionally stay up all night watching the favorite sports and watch the rebroadcast for other sports next day.

2. You may drink more water, have more fruit during stay up as this can prevent blood clogging and enhance your body immunity.
2、你可以多喝水,熬夜时多吃水果,这样可以防止血液堵塞,增强身体免疫力。
2. You may drink more water, have more fruit during stay up as this can reduce blood clogging and enhance your body immunity.
2、你可以多喝水,熬夜时多吃水果,这样可以减少堵血,增强身体免疫力。
2. You may drink more water, have more fruit during stay up as this can decrease blood clogging and enhance your body immunity.
2.你可以多喝水,多吃水果,这样可以减少堵血,增强身体免疫力。
On August 12 Beijing time, after three posture finals of women's 50-meters rifle in 2016 Rio Olympic Games, Chinese veteran Du Li won the bronze medal.
北京时间8月12日,在2016年里约奥运会女子50米步枪的三场决赛后,中国老兵杜力夺得了铜牌。
in August 12 Beijing time, after three posture finals of women's 50-meters rifle in 2016 Rio Olympic Games, Chinese veteran Du Li won the bronze medal.

Du Li became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
杜莉先后四次成为奥运会的冠军,在这4届奥运会上赢得了2枚金牌、1枚银牌和1枚铜牌。
Du Wei became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
杜薇先后四次荣获奥运金牌,在这4届奥运会上分别夺得了2枚金牌、1枚银牌和1枚铜牌。
Du Chen became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
杜陈先后四次荣获奥运金牌、银牌和铜牌,在本届奥运会上夺得了两枚金牌、一枚银牌和一枚铜牌。
Du Liu became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
杜刘先后四次夺得奥运会金牌、银牌和铜牌,在本届奥运会上夺得了两枚金牌、一枚银牌和一枚铜牌。
Du Chun became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.
杜春先后四次荣获奥运会金牌、银牌和铜牌,在本届奥运会上夺得两枚金牌、一枚银牌和一枚铜牌。
Du Zhang became a consequent winner of the Olympic Games for 4 times. She won 2 gold, 1 silver and 1 bronze medals in these 4 Olympic Games.

In 1998, she became a member of Shandong Province shooting team and followed Coach Wang Dewen for professional shooting training.
1998年,她成为山东省射击队的一员,跟随教练王德文进行专业射击训练。

In June, 2003, she participated in the women's 10-m air rifle of World Cup Croatia station and broke the world record with 504. 9 rings.
2003年6月,她参加了克罗地亚世界杯站女子10米气步枪的比赛,并打破了世界纪录,射出504.9枚炮弹。
in June, 2003, she participated in the women's 10-m air rifle of World Cup Croatia station and broke the world record with 504. 9 rings.
2003年6月,她参加了克罗地亚世界杯(World Coria)站女子10米气步枪的比赛,以504.9环打破了世界纪录。

In August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus won the first gold for the Chinese team in the Athens Olympic Games.
2004年8月,她赢得了女子气步枪10米金牌,从而为雅典奥运会中国队赢得了第一枚金牌。
in August, 2004, she won the women's 10-m air rifle gold medal and thus won the first gold for the Chinese team in the Athens Olympic Games.

In August, 2012, after serious failing in the London Olympic Games, Du Li announced the application for a temporary retirement to the International Stainless Steel Forum ( ISSF ).
2012年8月, 在伦敦奥运会严重失败后, 杜力宣布暂时退出国际不锈钢论坛 ( ISSAF ).
in August, 2012, after serious failing in the London Olympic Games, Du Li announced the application for a temporary retirement to the International Stainless Steel Forum ( ISSF ).
2012年8月,在伦敦奥运会严重失败后,杜力宣布暂时退出国际不锈钢论坛(ISSAF)。
the August, 2012, after serious failing in the London Olympic Games, Du Li announced the application for a temporary retirement to the International Stainless Steel Forum ( ISSF ).

In March, 2016, after the Rio Olympic qualification trials, after a lapse of 8 years, she won the women's 10-meter air rifle eligibility for the Olympic Games.
2016年3月,在里约奥运会资格考试结束后,她历时8年,赢得了女子10米气步枪的奥运会资格。

The documentary " Polar " is a large-scale work that focuses on the world's third pole, Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. It tells a story for the integration of Tibetan tradition and the modern world and the interaction between Tibet and the world from a new perspective.
纪录片《极地》以世界第三极青藏高原为主,从新角度讲述了西藏传统与现代世界融合和西藏与世界互动的故事。
The Documentary " Polar " is a large-scale work that focuses on the world's third pole, Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. It tells a story for the integration of Tibetan tradition and the modern world and the interaction between Tibet and the world from a new perspective.
纪录片《极地》是一部以世界第三极青藏高原为主的大型作品,从新角度讲述了藏族传统与现代世界融合和西藏与世界互动的故事。

and documentary " Polar " is a large-scale work that focuses on the world's third pole, Qinghai-Tibet Plateau. It tells a story for the integration of Tibetan tradition and the modern world and the interaction between Tibet and the world from a new perspective.
《极地》和纪录片《极地》是一部以世界第三极青藏高原为主的大型作品,从新的视角,讲述了西藏传统与现代世界融合、西藏与世界互动的故事。
The biggest advantage for VR works is to enable the audience to have a unique movie watching " immersion " and this also raise a higher request for the shooting process.
录像作品的最大优势在于让观众能够有一部独特的电影观看《沉浸》,这也提高了拍摄过程的要求。
The most advantage for VR works is to enable the audience to have a unique movie watching " immersion " and this also raise a higher request for the shooting process.

The direct consequence of this solar storm is that the US military has seen space weather as a combat concern and has built a stronger space weather forecast system.
这场太阳风暴的直接后果是,美国军方将空间气象视为一个战斗问题,并建立了更强大的空间天气预报系统。

在每天旅行中,当公民发现他们的车辆受到一辆奇怪的车辆的阻碍时,他们可能使用"WeChat车辆移动"功能来解决这个问题,因为他们无法与奇怪的车辆司机接触。

From August 11, Xi'an traffic police WeChat service number " Xi'an traffic police " launched " WeChat vehicle moving " service.

On April 27, 2015, the United States and Japan jointly issued a new version of " US-Japan defense cooperation guidelines " in New York, allowing the Japanese armed forces to play a more offensive role in the world.

The report is divided into nine chapters, including the overall policy adjustment, military strength, defense budget, military deployment, weapons and equipment, military system reform, military training, foreign military security cooperation and military security relations with China and so on.
全文分为政策调整、军力、国防预算、军事部署、武器装备、军事体制改革、军事训练、对外军事安全合作、与中国的军事安全关系等九章。

The report said that the year 2015 is a phased last year of the Abe government to promote major policy adjustments in the security area.

to report said that the year 2015 is a phased last year of the Abe government to promote major policy adjustments in the security area.
报道说,2015年是安倍政府去年推动安全领域重大政策调整的阶段性一年。
Since then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, mechanisms and policies.
自那以后,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务一级,而不是框架、机制和政策的重大调整和改变。
in then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, mechanisms and policies.
在那时,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务一级,而不是框架、机制和政策的重大调整和改变。
of then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, mechanisms and policies.
至此,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务层面,而不是框架、机制和政策的重大调整和改变。

and then, Japan's initiatives in the field of security will be mainly in the legal system, strategy implementation, policy implementation and other operational level, rather than the substantial adjustments and changes of framework, mechanisms and policies.
然后,日本在安全领域的举措将主要在法律制度、战略执行、政策执行和其他业务一级,而不是框架、机制和政策的重大调整和改变。
The report emphasized that the Abe Cabinet tried to break through the above three points to achieve the promotion of Japan's " normal nationalization ", and the going-out of militia to intervene in international security affairs, strengthen Japan-US alliance and prevent the rise of China and resist China.
报告强调,安倍内阁试图突破上述三点,以促进日本的“正常国有化”,并疏远民兵,干涉国际安全事务,加强日美同盟,防止中国崛起,抵抗中国。

报告说,安倍内阁试图突破上述三点,以促进日本的“正常国有化”,并疏远民兵,干涉国际安全事务,加强日美联盟,防止中国崛起,抵抗中国。
The report summarized that the Abe Cabinet tried to break through the above three points to achieve the promotion of Japan's " normal nationalization ", and the going-out of militia to intervene in international security affairs, strengthen Japan-US alliance and prevent the rise of China and resist China.
报告总结说,安倍内阁试图突破上述三点,以实现日本“正常国有化”和民兵出面干涉国际安全事务,加强日美同盟,防止中国崛起和中国抵抗。
The report noted that the Abe Cabinet tried to break through the above three points to achieve the promotion of Japan's " normal nationalization ", and the going-out of militia to intervene in international security affairs, strengthen Japan-US alliance and prevent the rise of China and resist China.
报告说,安倍内阁试图突破上述三点,以促进日本的“正常国有化”,并疏远民兵,干涉国际安全事务,加强日美同盟,防止中国崛起,抵抗中国。

The level of competitive sports is closely related to the foundation of national sports. Athletic sports depend in a certain sense on national sports, and national sports depend on the conditions of the site.

According to reports, as of 2015, the area of China's per capita sports venues has been 150 times of that when the new China was established, but still far behind the sports power.
据悉,截至2015年,中国人均体育场馆面积已是新中国成立时的150倍,但仍远远落后于体育实力。
According to estimates, as of 2015, the area of China's per capita sports venues has been 150 times of that when the new China was established, but still far behind the sports power.

规定补足短板的,有关部门应当充分考虑城市规划中体育场的布局。

另一方面,已经建成的公共体育场馆,包括学校和其他体育场馆的单位,应努力扩大开放范围,并尽可能提高效率。
of the other hand, the already built public sports venues, including schools and other units in the sports venues, should try to expand the scope of openness and try to improve efficiency as much as possible.
另一方面,已经建成的公共体育场馆,包括学校和其他体育场馆的单位,应努力扩大开放范围,尽量提高效率。
to the other hand, the already built public sports venues, including schools and other units in the sports venues, should try to expand the scope of openness and try to improve efficiency as much as possible.

Gilead to get attorney fees in hepatitis C patent fight with Merck
Gilead与默克公司竞争丙型肝炎专利获得律师费
Gilead to get attorney fees in hepatitis C patent battle with Merck
在丙型肝炎与默克的专利之争中,基列获得律师费
Gilead to get attorney fees in hepatitis C patent case with Merck
Gilead向默克公司收取丙型肝炎专利案的律师费
Gilead to get attorney fees in hepatitis C patent suit with Merck
Gilead向默克公司收取丙型肝炎专利诉讼的律师费
Gilead Sciences Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Sciences Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
Gilead Science Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Science Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
Gilead Technologies Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
基列(Gilead Technology Inc)有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费。
Gilead Research Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Research Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
Gilead Labs Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Labs Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经对制药商Merck & Co Inc作出裁决。
Gilead Laboratories Inc is entitled to receive the attorney fees it incurred related to hepatitis C patent litigation with drugmaker Merck & Co Inc, a U. S. district judge has ruled.
Gilead Laboratories Inc有权收取与丙型肝炎专利诉讼有关的律师费,美国地区法官已经裁定,该诉讼涉及制药商默克公司(Merck & Co Inc)。
In June, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
今年6月,在一名美国法官发现默克的不当行为模式,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为后,Gielead因侵犯与Gilead的巨型毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个默克专利而损失了2亿美元。
In July, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
7月,Gielead因侵犯与Gielead大片毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个Merck专利而损失了2亿美元,在此之前,美国法官发现,Merck有不当行为,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为。
In May, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
今年5月,在一名美国法官发现默克的不当行为模式,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为后,Gilead因侵犯与Gilead大片毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个默克专利而损失了2亿美元。
In April, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
今年4月,在一名美国法官发现默克的不当行为模式,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为后,Gilead因侵犯与Gilead大片毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个默克专利而损失了2亿美元。
In March, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
今年3月,在一名美国法官发现默克有不当行为,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为后,Gilead因侵犯与Gilead大片毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个默克专利而损失了2亿美元。
In September, Gilead was freed from paying up $ 200 million in damages for infringing two Merck patents related to Gilead's blockbuster drugs Sovaldi and Harvoni, after a U. S. judge found a pattern of misconduct by Merck including lying under oath and other unethical practices.
今年9月,在一名美国法官发现默克的不当行为模式,包括宣誓说谎和其他不道德行为后,Gilead因侵犯与Gilead大片毒品Sovaldi和Harvoni有关的两个默克专利而损失了2亿美元。
In a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼(Beth Labson Freeman)提交案卷时表示,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时支付的费用。
in a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
美国地区法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼在周四的存档中说,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时支付的费用。
a a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
美国地区法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼周四的存档说,基列有权免除在为案件辩护时收取的费用。

美国地区法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼于本周四提交案卷时表示,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时收取的费用。
to a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
周四,美国地方法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼在一份申请表上说,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时支付的费用。
the a filing on Thursday, U. S. District Judge Beth Labson Freeman said that Gilead was entitled to relief from the fees it incurred while defending the case.
美国地区法官贝思·拉夫森·弗里曼星期四的存档说,基莱德有权免除在为案件辩护时支付的费用。
Merck is trying to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 90 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正试图赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据主导地位,可治愈90%以上的肝病病人。
Merck is struggling to catch up to Gilead, which dominates the market on a new generation of hepatitis C drugs that can cure well over 90 percent of patients with the liver disease.
默克正在努力赶上基列,基列在新一代丙型肝炎药物上占据了市场主导地位,可治愈90%以上的肝病病人。
The case dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming ownership of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.
该案可追溯到2013年,当时基列和默克(Merck)相互起诉,声称拥有基列毒品活性成分Sofosbuvir的实验室工作。
The suit dates back to 2013 when Gilead and Merck sued each other, claiming ownership of laboratory work underlying sofosbuvir, the active ingredient in Gilead's drugs.

克林顿在2015年挣了1 075万美元,联邦税率为34.2%

In 2015, the Clintons made $ 1 million in charitable contributions, mostly to the Clinton Foundation ; former President Bill Clinton brought in nearly $ 5. 3 million in speaking fees ; and the former secretary of state reported income of $ 3 million from publisher Simon & Schuster for her book on her tenure at the State Department.
2015年,克林顿夫妇捐出了100万美元的慈善捐款,大部分捐给克林顿基金会;前总统比尔·克林顿带来了近530万美元的演讲费;前国务卿报告,出版商西蒙·舒斯特在国务院任职期间的著作的收入为300万美元。
In 2015, The Clintons made $ 1 million in charitable contributions, mostly to the Clinton Foundation ; former President Bill Clinton brought in nearly $ 5. 3 million in speaking fees ; and the former secretary of state reported income of $ 3 million from publisher Simon & Schuster for her book on her tenure at the State Department.
2015年,克林顿夫妇捐出了100万美元的慈善捐款,大部分捐给克林顿基金会;前总统比尔·克林顿带来了近530万美元的演讲费;前国务卿报告,出版商西蒙·舒斯特在国务院任职期间的著作的收入为300万美元。

克林顿在2015年向克林顿基金会捐赠了100万美元的慈善捐款,其中大部分捐给克林顿基金会;前总统比尔·克林顿带来了近530万美元的演讲费;前国务卿报告,她因在国务院任职期间的著作而从出版商Simon & Schuster那里获得300万美元的收入。
of 2015, the Clintons made $ 1 million in charitable contributions, mostly to the Clinton Foundation ; former President Bill Clinton brought in nearly $ 5. 3 million in speaking fees ; and the former secretary of state reported income of $ 3 million from publisher Simon & Schuster for her book on her tenure at the State Department.
克林顿夫妇向克林顿基金会捐赠了100万美元的慈善捐款,大部分捐给克林顿基金会;前总统比尔·克林顿带来了近530万美元的演讲费;前国务卿报告,出版商西蒙·舒斯特在国务院任职期间的著作的收入为300万美元。

上周,巴菲特(Berkshire Hathaway Communerated)位于内布拉斯加州奥马哈(Omaha)的一次民主集会挑战特朗普(Trump)开会和交换纳税申报表。
At a 2016 rally last week in Omaha, Nebraska, Buffett, whose Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate is based there, challenged Trump to meet and exchange tax returns.
上周,巴菲特(Berkshire Hathaway Communerated)位于内布拉斯加州奥马哈(Omaha),在2016年的上涨中,特朗普(Trump)对会面和交换纳税申报表提出了挑战。
in a Clinton rally last week in Omaha, Nebraska, Buffett, whose Berkshire Hathaway conglomerate is based there, challenged Trump to meet and exchange tax returns.
在上周于内布拉斯加州奥马哈举行的克林顿集会上,巴菲特(Berkshire Hathaway Communerate)挑战特朗普开会和交换纳税申报表。
Buffet said that he too was under IRS audit and Trump is " afraid " not of the tax-collection agency but of voters.
巴菲特说,他也受到国税局(IRS)的审计,特朗普“害怕”的不是税收机构,而是选民。

Clinton's campaign has released tax returns going back to 2007.
克林顿的竞选活动已经公布了从2007年开始的纳税申报表。

Jewish filmmaker slams Berlin hotel for removing Israel dial code after Arabs " request "-RT News
犹太电影制片人抨击柏林酒店取消以色列拨号后阿拉伯人"要求的"RT新闻"
A French filmmaker of Jewish origin unleashed a media furor after he revealed that the Kempinski Bristol hotel in Berlin does not list Israel's dial code, with employee citing " requests " from Arabic customers.
一位来自犹太人的法国电影制片人透露,柏林的Kempinski Bristol酒店没有列出以色列的拨号代码,而员工则引用阿拉伯客户的“请求”,这引发了媒体的愤怒。

小宝宝来到这个世界之后,爸爸妈妈要对他整个一生负责,不仅是为了他的健康,也是为了他的精神发展,也就是教育。

If such education failed, then no matter how successful your career is, you cannot make up for the shortcomings of life and family failure.
如果这样的教育失败了,那么无论你的事业有多成功,你都无法弥补生活和家庭失败的不足。

现年63岁的流浪汉汉和另一个流浪汉肖在饮酒后发生了争执,然后汉用一把水果刀刺死肖。

乌伯加入台湾市场已有4年,但对台湾传统出租车行业的影响也不小。
4 days after Uber joined the Taiwan market, it caused no small impact on the local traditional taxi industry.
乌伯入股台湾市场4天后,对台湾传统出租车业的影响也不小。
4 months after Uber joined the Taiwan market, it caused no small impact on the local traditional taxi industry.
乌伯入股台湾市场4个月后,对台湾传统出租车业的影响也不小。
4 years after Uber joined the Taiwan market, it caused no small impact on the local Traditional taxi industry.

According to the information of Taiwan " United Daily News " on August 12, more than 100 taxies bypassed Taiwan Executive Yuan for protest. This resulted in serious traffic paralysis in the surrounding area.
据台湾“联合日报”8月12日报道,100多个税务机关绕过台湾行政院进行抗议,致使周边地区交通严重瘫痪。

It has been four years since the arrival of Uber in Taiwan, but the authority just launched the meeting at the end of this month. Drivers cannot wait any more, said Zheng Lijia, the chairman of Taipei Driver Union.

to head of the Department of Industrial Coordination of the National Development and Reform Commission said that iron and steel overcapacity is now a global problem.
国家发改委工业协调部部长说,钢铁产能过剩已成为全球性问题。
China's capacity utilization in recent years is higher than the global average, but also higher than that of the United States and Europe and other countries and regions.
近年来,中国的产能利用率高于全球平均水平,也高于美国、欧洲等国家和地区。

in official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Council should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
正式指出中共中央和国务院应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
of official pointed out that the CPC Central Committee and State Council should attach great importance to the global problem of iron and steel overcapacity.
官员指出,中共中央和国务院应高度重视全球钢铁产能过剩问题。
All departments and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 45 million tons this year.
各部门、各地区要积极部署国务院,认真落实,今年粗钢生产能力减少4500万吨。
All ministries and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 45 million tons this year.
各部门和地区要积极部署国务院,认真做好,今年的粗钢生产能力要减少4500万吨。
All Department and regions should actively implement the deployment of the State Council, earnestly carry out the work, and reduce crude steel production capacity by 45 million tons this year.

From China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to control steel exports.
从中国国情看,中国不鼓励钢铁出口,而是采取一系列切实措施控制钢铁出口。

to China's national conditions, China does not encourage steel exports. On the contrary, it also takes a series of practical measures to control steel exports.

The person in charge stressed that the international trade of iron and steel products is essentially a market behavior and an independent choice from the requirement of importing countries and after considering the product cost and other factors.
负责人强调,钢铁产品的国际贸易本质上是一种市场行为,是独立于进口国的要求和在考虑产品成本及其他因素之后作出的选择。

The implementation of trade protection measures does not help to fundamentally solve the global steel industry development issues. On the contrary, it will only cause further impact on the international trade order.
实施贸易保护措施无助于从根本上解决全球钢铁行业发展问题,相反,只会对国际贸易秩序产生进一步的影响。

As the iron and steel enterprises are large-scale and involve a wide range of enterprises, the debt relationship is complex. It may lead to regional risks if disposed of improperly.

Some enterprises do not meet the changes in the market environment and the production and management is difficult to sustain or even on the brink of collapse. But restrained by some institutional factors, they become " zombie enterprises " due to many obstacles to the market.
有些 企业 无法 适应 市场 环境 的 变化, 生产 和 管理 很难 维持 甚至 处于 崩溃 的 边缘, 但 受到 一些 体制 因素 的 制约, 它们 由于 市场 的 许多 障碍 而 成为 “ 僵尸 企业 ” 。

In the afternoon of the 10th day of the month, the appearance of Chinese tourist police in the Red Square in Moscow immediately drew people's attention. Chinese tourists waved with surprise, and the local people and foreign tourists cannot help but to stop looking back.
本月10日下午,中国旅游警察在莫斯科红火广场的出现,引起了人们的注意,中国游客惊讶地挥手致意,当地人和外国游客忍不住要回头看一看。
In the evening of the 10th day of the month, the appearance of Chinese tourist police in the Red Square in Moscow immediately drew people's attention. Chinese tourists waved with surprise, and the local people and foreign tourists cannot help but to stop looking back.
本月十日晚上,中国旅游警察在莫斯科红火广场的出现,立即引起了人们的注意,中国游客惊讶地挥手致意,当地人和外国游客忍不住要回头看一看。

to the afternoon of the 10th day of the month, the appearance of Chinese tourist police in the Red Square in Moscow immediately drew people's attention. Chinese tourists waved with surprise, and the local people and foreign tourists cannot help but to stop looking back.
到了本月第10天的下午,中国旅游警察在莫斯科红场的出现立即引起了人们的注意,中国游客惊讶地挥手致意,当地人和外国游客忍不住要往回看。
On the same day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
同日,海南省公安局三亚市旅游警察分遣队第一位专业旅游警察分遣队来到莫斯科红场,与当地值班警察联系。
On the also day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
当天,海南省三亚市公安局旅游警察分遣队第一批专业旅游警察来到莫斯科红场,与当地值班警察联系。
On the August day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
八月一日,海南省公安局三亚市旅游警察分遣队第一支专业旅游警察队伍来到莫斯科红火广场,与当地值班警察联系。
On the May day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
五月一日,海南省公安局三亚市旅游警察分遣队第一支专业旅游警察队伍来到莫斯科红场,与当地值班警察联系。
On the day day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
当天,海南省三亚市公安局旅游警察分遣队第一批专业旅游警察来到莫斯科红火广场,与当地值班警察联系。
On the October day, China's first professional travel police team-members of Tourism Police Detachment, Sanya City, Hainan Province Public Security Bureau came to the Red Square in Moscow, and communicated with the local police on duty.
10月1日,海南省公安局三亚市旅游警察分遣队专业旅游警察小组组长来到莫斯科红火广场,与当地值班警察联系。
Moscow travel police are divided into three groups for duty patrol in the Red Square, Nicolieski pedestrian street and Gu Mu Department Store. The Chinese tourist police also followed for study. The whole process lasted more than an hour.
莫斯科旅游警察分为红场、尼科利斯基人行道和古木百货公司三组值班巡逻,中国旅游警察也跟踪考察,整个过程持续了一个多小时。

Lei Sakov, the brigade captain of Moscow city police said that in recent years, Moscow's urban environment and tourism ambience have become better and better, attracting more and more foreign tourists.

In order to meet the needs of tourism development, it set up a tourist police team in July 2014, responsible for patrol in the major scenic spots, thus helping and diverting the tourists.
为了满足旅游业发展的需要,2014年7月设立了旅游警察工作队,负责在主要景点巡逻,从而帮助和转移游客。

The police brigade divided them into nine groups according to their foreign language levels. They have two classes per week, learn self-defense moves, laws and regulations and foreign languages.
警察大队根据他们的外语水平分为9组,每周2个班级,学习自卫行动、法律法规和外语。
The police brigades divided them into nine groups according to their foreign language levels. They have two classes per week, learn self-defense moves, laws and regulations and foreign languages.
警察分队根据外语水平分为9组,每周2个班级,学习自卫行动、法律法规和外语。
The police battalion divided them into nine groups according to their foreign language levels. They have two classes per week, learn self-defense moves, laws and regulations and foreign languages.

The police unit divided them into nine groups according to their foreign language levels. They have two classes per week, learn self-defense moves, laws and regulations and foreign languages.

Lysakov told reporters that the Moscow Tourism Police since its inception, have accumulated a certain amount of experience and hoped to inspire counterparts in Sanya.
利萨科夫对记者说,莫斯科旅游警察自成立以来,积累了一定的经验,希望能激励三亚的同行。

He believes that the cooperation between the Russian and Chinese police departments will enhance the security sense of their citizens to each other's national tourism.
他认为,中俄两国警方的合作将增强两国公民对本国旅游业的安全感。

Chinanews journalist found that there are at least nine provinces and cities issuing rules for the implementation of residence permit, including Hebei, Jilin, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Hainan, Gansu, Fujian and Beijing, etc.
中国新闻记者发现,河北、吉林、天津、江西、四川、海南、甘肃、福建、北京等至少9个省市颁发了居留证实施细则。

Chinanews journalist found that there are of least nine provinces and cities issuing rules for the implementation of residence permit, including Hebei, Jilin, Tianjin, Jiangxi, Sichuan, Hainan, Gansu, Fujian and Beijing, etc.
中国新闻记者发现,在河北、吉林、天津、江西、四川、海南、甘肃、福建、北京等9个省份和城市中,至少有9个省份和城市颁发了居留证。
For the conditions of applying for residence permit, the above regions generally said that the applicants need to live more than six months and meet one of these three requirements : having legitimate and stable employment, having legal and stable residence and continuous study.
在申请居留证的条件方面,上述地区一般说,申请人需要生活六个月以上,并符合这三项要求中的一项要求:合法和稳定就业,合法和稳定居住,不断学习。

" Residence Permit Provisional Regulations " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 15 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起15日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Rules " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 15 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行规定》规定,对于符合居留证条件的,公安机关应当自接受之日起15日内颁发居留证。
" Residence Permit Provisional Regulation " provides that, for those in line with the residence permit conditions, the public security organs shall issue a residence permit within 15 days from the date of acceptance.
《居留证暂行条例》规定,对于符合居留证条件的人,公安机关应当自接受之日起15日内颁发居留证。

For the time limit, most of the region hold the same opinion with the national version. That is, to release the permit within 15 days.
在限期内,大部分地区对国内版本持相同看法,即在15天内发放许可证。

Hebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permit within 3 working days from the date of acceptance.
河北省明确规定,对符合申请条件并持有完整申请文件的申请人,户籍警察局应当自受理之日起3个工作日内颁发居留证。
thebei clearly stipulates that for applicants who meet the conditions of application and have complete application documents, the residence police station shall issue a residence permit within 3 working days from the date of acceptance.
虽经明确规定,对于符合申请条件并持有完整申请文件的申请人,居留派出所应当自受理之日起3个工作日内颁发居留证。

In accordance with the " residence permit provisional regulations ", the above cities stipulate clearly that the cost of certificate production shall be exempted in case of initial application of residence permit.

For example, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
例如,四川要求当地派出所或委托社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或乘坐费。
For is, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
因此,四川要求地方派出所或者委托社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额收费、超额收费或者乘坐费。
For in, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
四川要求地方派出所或者社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额收费、超额收费或者乘坐费。
For as, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
四川要求地方派出所或者社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或者乘坐费。
For was, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
因此,四川要求地方派出所或者委托社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或者乘坐费。
For that, Sichuan required the local police stations or commissioned community service agencies shall strictly enforce the approved fees and charges standard and resolutely prohibit over-range, over-standard fees or ride fees.
为此,四川要求地方派出所或者社区服务机构严格执行核定收费标准,坚决禁止超额、超标准收费或者乘坐费。

据悉,2016年7月27日,前甘州市定南县委书记陈扬霞来到省纪律检查委员会报到,担任中国共产党监事室主任(副主任,缓刑期一年)。
It was concluded that on July 27, 2016, Chen Yangxia, the former Ganzhou City Dingnan County Party Secretary came to the Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection for reporting and serving as director of the CPC supervision room ( deputy director-general, one year's probation period ).
总结认为,2016年7月27日,前甘州市定南县委书记陈扬霞来到省纪律检查委员会报到,担任中国共产党监事室主任(副主任,缓刑期一年)。
It was ruled that on July 27, 2016, Chen Yangxia, the former Ganzhou City Dingnan County Party Secretary came to the Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection for reporting and serving as director of the CPC supervision room ( deputy director-general, one year's probation period ).
规定2016年7月27日,前甘州市定南县委书记陈扬霞到省纪律检查委员会报到,担任中国共产党监理室主任(副主任,缓刑期一年)。

The future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
位于维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂的未来以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止一项供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
The future at the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
维多利亚州波特兰铝冶炼厂的未来以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
The future operating the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
未来在维多利亚州运营的波特兰铝冶炼厂以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供披露工厂业主之一的工厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
to future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
对未来在维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂和数百工人的工作,供应工厂的电力公司披露工厂的业主之一将终止供应合同,预期所有供应合同都将被取消。
the future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
位于维多利亚州的波特兰铝厂的未来以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供透露工厂业主之一的电厂的电力公司存在疑问,该公司将终止一项供应合同,所有供应合同预计将被取消。
and future of the Portland aluminium smelter in Victoria-and the jobs of hundreds of workers-is in doubt with the power company which supplies the plant disclosing one of the plant's owners is to terminate a supply contract, with all supply contracts expected to be axed.
和在维多利亚州的波特兰铝冶炼厂的未来,以及数百名工人的就业情况,与向工厂提供透露工厂业主之一的电力公司存在疑问的是终止供应合同,预计将取消所有供应合同。
The move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.
此前,维多利亚州政府今年早些时候决定不再向该工厂提供维持运行所需的补贴。
the move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.

of move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.

in move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.

and move follows the decision of the Victoria government earlier this year to not extend subsidies provided to keep the plant in operation.
并继维多利亚州政府今年早些时候决定不再提供补贴以维持该工厂的运作之后,采取了上述措施。

Alcoa said the decision to close out the contracts " does not affect BPcoa's... ability to operate the smelter or secure electricity supply to the smelter. "
美国铝业公司称,终止合同的决定“并不影响英国石油公司......经营冶炼厂或确保冶炼厂电力供应的能力。”
The US company said it entered into a 20-year contract with Loy Yang in 2010, which was due to commence from November this year, although it has yet to explain why it has pulled out of the contract.
这家美国公司表示,它于2010年与Loy Yang订立了为期20年的合同,该合同定于今年11月开始,尽管该公司尚未解释为何退出了该合同。
The USA company said it entered into a 20-year contract with Loy Yang in 2010, which was due to commence from November this year, although it has yet to explain why it has pulled out of the contract.

The US company said it entered into a 20-term contract with Loy Yang in 2010, which was due to commence from November this year, although it has yet to explain why it has pulled out of the contract.
这家美国公司表示,它于2010年与Loy Yang签订了一份为期20年的合同,定于今年11月开始,尽管该公司尚未解释为何退出了该合同。

Analysts have been wary of the possible closure of both of the Portland smelter in Victoria and also the Tomago plant near Newcastle due to the poor economics of the industry.
分析师一直担心,由于纽卡斯尔的经济状况不佳,维多利亚港兰冶炼厂和纽卡斯尔附近的托马戈厂可能关闭。
Analysts had been wary of the possible closure of both of the Portland smelter in Victoria and also the Tomago plant near Newcastle due to the poor economics of the industry.
分析师们一直担心,由于纽卡斯尔港兰冶炼厂的经济状况不佳,可能关闭维多利亚港兰冶炼厂和纽卡斯尔附近的托马戈炼油厂。
Addressing analysts earlier in the week, AGL's head of operations, Stephen Mikkelsen said Portland uses around 600 megawatts of power annually and Tomago around 900 megawatts.
默克尔森(Stephen Mikkelsen)表示,波特兰的电力年使用量约为600兆瓦,而托马戈的电力年使用量约为900兆瓦。

More than 160, 000 of the nation's most vulnerable are turned away from community legal centres every year, with the sector bracing itself for the impact further funding cuts will have on already-stretched operations.
每年有160,000多位最脆弱的国家从社区法律中心转向社区法律中心,该部门随时准备进一步削减资金将对已经捉襟见肘的行动产生何种影响。
