The federal government will cut funding by 30 per cent from June 2017, which means thousands more vulnerable Queenslanders will be forced to navigate complex legal problems without help.
联邦政府将从2017年6月起将资金削减30%,这意味着昆士兰地区数以千计的弱势民众将被迫在没有帮助的情况下解决复杂的法律问题。

从2017年6月起,联邦政府将把资金削减30%,这意味着昆士兰州上千名弱势民众将被迫在没有帮助的情况下解决复杂的法律问题。
We call on the Attorney-General, and Queensland Senator George Brandis to immediately reverse these funding cuts, so people can get the help they need when they're faced with a legal problem.
我们吁请总检察长和昆士兰州参议员乔治·布兰迪斯立即逆转这些资金削减,这样人们在面临法律问题时就能够得到所需的帮助。

Donald Trump campaign sued after staffer allegedly pulled a gun
据称,唐纳德·特朗普的竞选活动是在工作人员拉枪后被起诉的
Donald Trump campaign sued after staffer alleged pulled a gun
唐纳德·特朗普的竞选活动被起诉,因为当时的幕僚声称他拉了一支枪
New York : Donald Trump's campaign was sued for allegedly doing nothing after being told that the director of its North Carolina operations pulled a gun on a staffer as they drove in a Jeep in February.
纽约:唐纳德·特朗普(Donald Trump)被指控在2月份驾驶吉普车时因被告知北卡罗莱纳州行动负责人用枪指向一名职员而无所作为。

We have a great team at Heathrow who have implemented an £11bn programme of infrastructure investment on time and on budget, from T5-voted the world's best airport terminal five years in a row, to T2, built in the middle of the world's busiest two runways.
在希思罗,我们有一个伟大的团队,他们及时和预算地实施了110亿英镑的基础设施投资计划,从连续5年以T5票当选的全球最佳机场终点站,到在全球最繁忙的两条跑道中间建造的T2。

The court found that the policewoman-- who was responding to an emergency call-- was driving in a manner that was justified and that the presence of a man on the road was a " completely exceptional and unpredictable situation, " the judge said.

NASA climate model : Venus was once habitable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾适宜居住
NASA climate model : Venus was once habitatable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾是栖息地
NASA climate model : Venus was once oxygenable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾经是可氧的
NASA climate model : Venus was once aridable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾是干燥的
NASA climate model : Venus was once sustainable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾经是可持续的
NASA climate model : Venus was once greenhouseable
美国宇航局气候模型:金星曾是温室型
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新的气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections for a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the projections using a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局(NASA)使用新气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the estimates of a new NASA climate model.
根据NASA新的气候模型的估计, 金星可能曾经适宜居住.
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the predictions of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局新气候模型的预测,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
Venus was likely once habitable, according to the scenarios of a new NASA climate model.
根据美国宇航局(NASA)新的气候模型的假设,金星可能曾经适宜居住。
The model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星是否具有其热、无水的表面和二氧化碳充斥的大气层,是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。
in model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
在模型中,金星是用来决定它具有热、无水的表面和二氧化碳充斥的大气层的,是否曾经存在过类似于地球的条件。
the model was designed to determine whether or not Venus, with its hot, water-less surface and CO2-chocked atmosphere, might have once hosted Earth-like conditions.
该模型旨在确定金星是否具有其热、无水的表面和二氧化碳的大气层,是否曾经承载过类似于地球的条件。

Scientists have previously suggested that Venus'slow rotation rate is explained by its thick atmosphere.
科学家以前曾建议,金星的缓慢旋转速度是由它的厚厚的大气层来解释的.
Scientists have previously suggested that Venus'slow rotation velocity is explained by its thick atmosphere.

但最近的模拟表明,金星本可以自豪地拥有一个像地球一样的薄薄的大气层,并且仍然缓慢地旋转。

壳牌公司(Shell)已经裁员数千人,并宣布了在与英国能源公司BG Group(BG Group)进行大规模合并后,壳牌公司(Shell)正在精简业务后,将石油和天然气业务外包给至多10个国家。

Shell, for its part, has cut thousands of people from its payroll and announced plans to leave oil and gas operations in up to 10 countries as it streamlines its operations in the wake of its mega-merger with British energy company BG Group.

油价下跌对能源公司造成了压力,英国6月份决定退出欧盟,使这一经济形势雪上加霜。

Kepler measures each star's spin rate by tracking the time between the appearance of recognizable starspots-- like sunspots.

" In the'ballet'of the Pleiades, we see that slow rotators tend to be more massive, whereas the fastest rotators tend to be very light stars, " said Rebull.
在星的'ballet中,我们看到慢转子的体积比较大,而最快转子的体积则比较轻。

Because the Pleiades cluster is so close, it serves as an ideal cosmic laboratory to compare stellar qualities with spin rates.
由于星群非常接近,所以它是一个理想的宇宙实验室来比较恒星质量和自旋速率。
Because the Pleiades cluster is so close, it serves as an ideal stellar laboratory to compare stellar qualities with spin rates.
由于星群非常接近,它是一个理想的星座实验室,可以比较恒星质量和自旋速率。
Because the Pleiades cluster is so close, it serves as an ideal astronomical laboratory to compare stellar qualities with spin rates.
由于星群非常接近,因此它是一个理想的天文实验室,可以比较恒星质量和自旋速率。
Because the Pleiades cluster is so close, it serves as an ideal rotating laboratory to compare stellar qualities with spin rates.
由于星群非常接近,所以它是一个理想的旋转实验室,可以将恒星质量与自旋速率进行比较。

" The Pleiades star cluster provides an anchor for theoretical models of stellar rotation going both directions, younger and older, " said Rebull.
普莱德星团为恒星向上旋转的理论模型提供了一个锚,这种理论模型向上向下移动,越来越年轻,也越来越老。”鲁布尔说。
" The Pleiades star cluster provides an anchor for theoretical models of stellar rotation going both direction, younger and older, " said Rebull.
普莱德星团为恒星自转的理论模型提供了一个锚,这种理论模型向两个方向移动,越来越年轻,也越来越老。”鲁布尔说。
" The Pleiades star cluster provides an anchor for theoretical models of stellar rotation going all directions, younger and older, " said Rebull.
普莱德星团为恒星旋转的理论模型提供了一个锚,这些恒星旋转的方向越来越小,越来越老。”鲁布尔说。
" The Pleiades star cluster provides an anchor for theoretical models of stellar rotation going two directions, younger and older, " said Rebull.
普莱德星团为恒星旋转的理论模型提供了一个锚,向两个方向移动,年轻和老。

从奥运会的新闻报道中,所有媒体在传播方式、产品形式、语言风格、新闻透视等各个方面都发生了许多变化。
From the news coverage of the Olympic Games, all media have made a lot of changes in the aspect of mode of transmission, product form, language style, news perspective and many other aspects.
从奥运会的新闻报道来看,所有媒体在传播方式、产品形式、语言风格、新闻视角等方面都发生了很大的变化。
From the news broadcasts of the Olympic Games, all media have made a lot of changes in the aspect of mode of transmission, product form, language style, news perspective and many other aspects.
从奥林匹克运动会的新闻广播中,所有媒体在传播方式、产品形式、语言风格、新闻透视等各个方面都发生了许多变化。
From the news broadcast of the Olympic Games, all media have made a lot of changes in the aspect of mode of transmission, product form, language style, news perspective and many other aspects.
从奥林匹克运动会的新闻转播情况看,所有媒体在传播方式、产品形式、语言风格、新闻视角等方面都发生了很大的变化。
It seems that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
看来,国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者必须迎接这一轮的挑战。
It appears that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
看来,国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者必须迎接这一轮的挑战。
It looks that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
看来,国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者必须迎接这一轮挑战。
It seem that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
看来,国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者必须迎接这一轮的挑战。
It is that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
正是国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者必须迎接这一轮挑战。
the seems that the International Olympic Committee and the media practitioners around the world will have to meet this round of challenges.
似乎国际奥委会和世界各地的媒体工作者将不得不迎接这一轮的挑战。
On August 11, this is the last day for the open sale of Everbright Securities H shares. News went that the market response was not special for market of the previous two days. According to the plan, it will be listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on August 18.
8月11日是公开出售Everbright Securities H股的最后一天。新闻指出,股市的反应对前两天的市场并非特别。根据该计划,该公司将于8月18日在香港证券交易所上市。
in August 11, this is the last day for the open sale of Everbright Securities H shares. News went that the market response was not special for market of the previous two days. According to the plan, it will be listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange on August 18.

A domestic brokerage analyst said that the Orient Securities in Hong Kong did not enjoy a good foundation. Only its capital management business is its strength. It has many inherent problems compared with Bank of China International and CITIC Securities, etc.
一名国内券商分析师表示,香港东方证券没有良好基础,只有其资产管理业务的实力,与中国国际银行(Bank of China International)和中信证券(ICTIC Securities)等公司相比,存在诸多内在问题。
A overseas brokerage analyst said that the Orient Securities in Hong Kong did not enjoy a good foundation. Only its capital management business is its strength. It has many inherent problems compared with Bank of China International and CITIC Securities, etc.
一名海外券商分析师表示,香港东方证券没有良好基础,只有其资产管理业务的实力,与中国国际银行(Bank of China International)和中信证券(ICTIC Securities)等公司相比,存在诸多内在问题。

Experts pointed out that with the return of the securities market to flatness, many brokers sagged this year in results. But the detailed situation of the listed companies is dependent on the detailed development of the corporate business and cannot be generalized.
专家指出,随着证券市场恢复平稳,今年许多经纪商的业绩都出现了下滑,但上市公司的详细状况取决于公司业务的详细发展,不能一概而论。

After the introduction of the regulation of the new deal, Suzhou will become the first second-tier city to restart the purchase restriction.
在新协议出台后,苏州将成为首个重新启动购房限制的二线城市。
to the introduction of the regulation of the new deal, Suzhou will become the first second-tier city to restart the purchase restriction.

in the introduction of the regulation of the new deal, Suzhou will become the first second-tier city to restart the purchase restriction.
在新协议出台后,苏州将成为首个重新启动购房限制的二线城市。

and the introduction of the regulation of the new deal, Suzhou will become the first second-tier city to restart the purchase restriction.
随着新协议的出台,苏州将成为首个重新启动购房限制的二线城市。
In addition to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will also introduce the property market regulation and control policies.
除苏州市外,合肥、南京等二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。
In and to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will also introduce the property market regulation and control policies.
在苏州,合肥和南京等其它二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。

在苏州,合肥、南京等二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。

在苏州,合肥和南京等其它二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。

In in to Suzhou, other second-tier cities including Hefei and Nanjing will also introduce the property market regulation and control policies.
在苏州,合肥、南京等二线城市也将引入房地产市场监管政策。
Prior to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
在此之前,合肥是第一个发布贷款限制政策的人。对于那些在合肥有两套房和一栋住房贷款没有支付的人,银行会拒绝给他们抵押贷款服务。
Prior to that, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
在此之前,合肥是第一个发布贷款限制政策的人。对于那些在合肥有两套房和一栋住房贷款没有支付的人,银行会拒绝给他们抵押贷款服务。
the to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
至此,合肥率先对贷款政策作出限制。对于那些在合肥有两套房和一栋住房贷款未偿付的人,银行将拒绝给予他们抵押贷款服务。
in to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
为此,合肥率先对贷款政策作出限制。对于那些在合肥有两套房和一栋住房贷款未偿付的人,银行将拒绝给予他们的抵押贷款服务。
of to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
除此之外,合肥是第一个发布贷款限制政策的人。对于那些在合肥有两套房,而且有一套住房贷款没有支付的人,他们将被拒绝银行的抵押贷款服务。
and to this, Hefei has been the first to issue restrictions on lending policy. For people who have two suites in Hefei and have one housing loan not paid, they will be denied with the mortgage services from bank.
因此合肥是第一个对贷款政策进行限制的人。对于那些在合肥有两套房,而且有一套住房贷款没有支付的人,银行将拒绝给他们按揭服务。
